content: Horrible app. Way too buggy, and extremely slow. Will freeze up within seconds of data loading, and will send you back to the home page, but the app almost always can't even display the home page properly. Loading errors, and when it does load, it is slower than you can imagine. Literally takes a full ten seconds for you to click on something and add it to the cart. Takes maybe twenty or thirty seconds to fully show the reviews and recommended items for each page.

Very good experience with all the features and navigations. the only thing needs to be improved is filters. the all does not allow to select multiple filters at one time. the moment user selects one filter, the filter closes and search starts. because of which user has to go to filters multiple times to add multiple filters. A suggestion to improve filters.

July 2019. I love Amazon but the app just keeps getting worse. No longer allows infinite scrolling. Places ads at the bottom of pages and requires you to press next. It's getting harder to find what you want because of all the sponsored and less popular stuff being inserted at the top of results. Sorting doesn't work right anymore. I think I'll try to use my computer browser instead of this app from now on. New layout of results makes browsing difficult.

If I could give it 0 stars I would. With the last update I started getting so many pop up ads on my phone that it became nearly impossible to use. I would literally get one every 10-15 seconds. Virus scans turned up nothing. Then I noticed that every ad I was getting was related to this app. I uninstalled the update and haven't had a pop up since. I can understand why advertising is necessary but when I can't make a phone call or even check the time because of the ads it gets ridiculous.

more clutter and slower than the previous app, which they did not care to uninstall when forcing the move to this version. general shopping continues to get worse - scrolling through hundreds of similar items you can't filter out, only to have the app freeze before you get to something interesting. either improve the filtering or go back to being able to skip entire pages of results. I shop more on Ebay now as a result.

New user interface is appalling, there are article type things for recommended products that you have to scroll past, you have to choose and apply filters one at a time, you have to go through pages.. the once super easy, streamline app is now a hassle to use for shopping or even browsing products. They seem more focused on putting everything in your face other than what you're really shopping for.This app has really gone downhill with the last couple updates. Change it back, make it good again.

Switched from the Amazon underground app since it's no longer supported. This one is slower in almost every respect, click on the add to cart button and it's a 50/50 chance that it will actually work (had the same problem with the underground app but not nearly as often). trying to click on a product picture so you can zoom in only works sometimes. I reinstalled the underground app from backup (rooted phone)   All and all I'll keep using the Amazon underground app as long as I can or maybe just not shop at amazon except when I'm on a computer as this app borders on annoying edging toward useless.

App generally functions as expected and is fine on that front. However, my notification bar is for notifications, not ads. It is inappropriate for the app to be "notifying" me about things like "time to stock up? View recommendations based on your recent purchases". I get that you can technically turn these off, but I should not need to go into app settings to disable ads in my notification bar.

More on the company and less on the app. Always the last one I swear to get deliveries. Months ordering cause of availability and almost every time my package is late showing up in the middle of the night and just sits there all night. Has to be a better more efficient way. Every time this happens it just comes late or not at all, that's happened more then a few times. Bad planning or just unorganized in crunch times not sure what to say

Big disappointment. Just about every third (or so) time I use it, it gives me the "Oops, something went wrong" message. I never had this issue with the older app, but it seems I can't use it anymore. I would switch back in a heartbeat if I could. Too frustrating ... I've been going to Amazon only on my laptop since this new app makes me crazy. Advice to Amazon for the future -- if it ain't broke, don't fix it.

Soooo slow, every single time I go to look at an item, I have to wait for all the images and ads surrounding the item to load and its sooo slow and frustrating. I'd like to be able to shop with ease and not have to wait for all the junk on the link to load... all my other apps are super fast, my internet and data connections and speeds are at the top,. It's only this app and it sucks!

Worked great for years on my phone. About mid-day today it just stopped, would not open. Tried restarting, reinstalling, installing a previous version from October. Nothing worked. It's Christmas shopping season so I finally had to resort to the Amazon App store version to get back on track. Not as elegant as Google's but the Playstore version is non-functional.

Having been forced to use this instead of the Underground app it is such a step backwards. The wishlist doesn't load unless you add a new item, the 'buy it now' button doesn't work as it just repeatedly asks to log in then returns to the same screen. The only way to purchase is to add to basket and then go to shopping cart. So many bugs for a popular app

If I force close the app, then reopen it, I can browse for a few minutes before it stops responding again. "sorry, there's a problem with this page right now. We're working on fixing it" and a 'try again' button. Only thing that works is force closing and reopening again. I get maybe two to three minutes of browsing before it stops responding. Can't wait for this long running issut to be fixed properly.

Always trying to make money to the point of I wanted instrument clusters. I put the filter of 50-100$. What's it do give me 90 plus light bulbs all under $20 saying featured. So I change it to high to low on pricing. First off it dropped half the items instead of reorganizing them(tried it a few times, I wasnt messing up). And ONLY kept the featured items. F*** Bezos

Ruined by hangup at checkout. It takes absolutely ages to load when changing delivery address or delivery type, to the point that many times i ended up not ordering so the whole thing of choosing the right products and fiddling with picking options turned into a total waste of time. It works absolutely fine until i get to the checkout options part.

This app is Not the easiest to navigate through! I'm pretty savvy w/ electronics, and still couldn't figure out how to show items solely in the US. Browsing on here - you'll continously be shown merchandise you'd undoubtedly enjoy, but are not avail! Like what's even the point then??! Needs additional searching filters while on mobile site, too. I opt to display items (price) low - high, 80% of my results magically disappear.

took away features some of us like. Rather than adding a toggle for the wishlist at the bottom of the page they removed the wishlist drag and drop feature for everyone. I quite liked seeing my wishlist there and swiping items in it so I can compare them side by side while shopping. now it's something I have to actively open without being able to see it while shopping. I built outfits on there. I hope they bring it back.

This new app sucks!!!!!!! If I search for something in one of my lists and accidentally hit the wrong item to browse I'll hit the back button and instead of going back to my space it takes me all the way back to the top. Then I have to start over. I have long lists so this makes me very angry!!!!!!!!! I want the old app back. I hate the new search option too.

I've used this app almost daily for ages, but the latest update is terrible. Having to click through pages every 10 or 20 search results rather than a continuous scroll is terrible design, and the filters/sorting switched from a popup menu to (again) clicking through pages. It's like they took the app design back to 1990's desktop tech. If you haven't updated your app yet, DON'T.

I used to be a huge fan of amazon and have spent a small fortune through their site. Most of the time the process goes smoothly and your product arrives timely. However, their customer service has become awful when it doesnt. Most recently, they cancelled my prime account without my permission and refunded the cost rather than resolve the issue at hand. They would rather lose a customer instead of fixing several week delay on my product.

the new update is TERRIBLE. Why have you changed the filter layout? Before the update the filter section stayed on the same page. Now when you click the filter option, it takes you to a seperate screen, away from your search. The new feature has also slowed down my app. It takes a few seconds for the new filter screen to appear. Sometimes the filters dont appear at all, and i have to restart the app a few time. Go BACK to the original design/layout!

Kinda like CostCo or IKEA, but without the fun: impossible to shop without wasting a lot of time, & you'll probably spend more money than you'd intended. It's also the Facebook of shopping: overly "sticky", bloated with opportunities to "engage", truly awful UI. Only useful if you have a very specific need & know the exact part number or equiv., hence the second star.

I love Amazon & use it all the time (we have Amazon Prime), BUT, I hate this app! I rarely leave reviews on products (which isn't very cool of me as I depend on other people's reviews so much) but it is unbelievable to me that a company as large & as wealthy as Amazon can't make a decent app that doesn't crash constantly!! I have NEVER had another app that crashes this much! When the app crashes, it takes away the ability to press the back button so I can choose previous products I was viewing

What works well are wish lists, reminders that you have stuff in your basket or that products on your wish list are on sale. What's annoying is that for a long time now, no-one seems to have bothered to take another look at categorization and filters. Example: I want to look for vinyl records only and want to get there only using categories and filters, but there simply is no way to go to e.g. music and then select vinyl. Improvement, please, every second class online shop does this better!

Really pissed off as suddenly Amazon has started double dipping into my account for orders. When I asked customer service why my account is being charged more than once for the same item I was told it is an initial hold on the money "to make sure its there" So the money for the items is taken out of my account when I order and then again when it ships. So I have double the money gone from my account and the first charge will be returned to me in 3-5 business days. This is ridiculous! Cancelling!

Amazon was excellent up until a while ago. I am not sure what changed, but doing my monthly work purchase invoices has become a nightmare as none of my order amounts corresponds to anything on my bank statements as was previously. Very reluctant to make any more work related purchases on Amazon until this is sorted out. That goes for everyone working with me as well. Everyone is complaining.

Very slow, keeps crashing, filter doesn't react. But worst of all the support and service (in Germany). My account was closed for no reason and I cannot create a new one. I've been a prime member for a long time and I don't understand what happened here in the last month. When I called the support they couldn't tell me the reasons or how to fix it. I had to switch to another music app and audiobook app. Honestly I am not going to order from Amazon ever again. They just lost a big customer.

I cannot get this app to work, s8+. The search bar is unresponsive. I tap it but can not get it to invoke the keyboard to enter my search. If I rotate screen I can get it to work. I Uninstaller all updates, cleared data, reinstalled no luck. I use the older app and it works fine. But have received notice it will not be supported going forward. I would love for the app to work on my phone. Hopefully it will work on s10+

Have always used this app, for almost a decade by now. Highly recommended. But, recent issue that my app won't even open. First instance ever, but a bad one. Thankfully I have a pc to back me up with that, website itself still kickin great. But the app has finally given me an issue. Not being able to use it ðŸ˜…. I'm sure they'll fix it asap but wow. Bad bug they got goin rn.

Products are quality goods and materials. Timely shipping and free depending on item(s), or if order(s) are in excess of a certain amount. Navigating through the app is a little frustrating, for me, as I seem to get bumped from one item to the next and I end up lost in Amazon cyber-space. (That's probably a personal problem; my millennials - children, tell me I'm "tech-tarded"!) Otherwise, GREAT SHOPPING EXPERIENCE!ðŸ¤“

So frustrated. Amazon made me get this new app for shopping. Now I try to add something to my cart and it freezes. I try to see other colors and the looking through the stockroom option never finishes loading. I can't change the quantity. I use Amazon for everything. It is my go to. I don't have time to shop in stores but i also don't have time to waste trying to get a glitchy app to work! Fix this please!

I don't know if this is an app issue or an Amazon issue. As far as searching for clothing, I'll do my search (i.e. men's running shoes) and 2,000 results come up. If i go to sort by price: low to high, it reduces to 4 results. If I select price: high to low, it jumps to 863. Then if I actually find something I like, it will advertise one price, then when I select my size, the price can double or triple. It makes it nearly impossible to try to find anything clothing-wise.

[For reasons unknown, my review from last night has disappeared. I am sorely tempted to drop my prior rating from a 2 to a 1 on that alone.] The app functions and the UI is OK, but the search filters are terribly lacking compared to the desktop website. There are much fewer on the mobile app and you can only check and uncheck one at a time. Add the padding from all the sponsored listings, and this can make for a frustrating browsing experience.

Latest update changed the filters to be less helpful, instead of just scrolling through and selecting what I need; if I enter a section on the filter I now have to select back to get out, but it completely takes you out of the filters so you have to keep going back in to the filters. Also now there are pages... Instead of just scrolling and scrolling now we have to select next page and wait for it to load, too much. What a pain in the butt for a mobile app. Amazon change it back please.

I loved shopping on Amazon until the most recent update. 1) The app is ridiculously slow. 2) Searching is a nightmare. 3) Filtering a search is even more of a nightmare because you can't select multiple options. 4) The drag & drop feature for adding items to a list has disappeared. Aren't apps supposed to be more convenient than websites? Not in this case. The Amazon app is the website's mini me, and that's not a good thing. Come on guys. You were doing so well!

Everytime I search for items the items will be one price then they change based off my search history and the size of the items. Then ill look from someone else's account and see the original price I saw prior to me actually adding the item to my cart. They are bait and switch. I know some items are priced differently based off of the size but then sometimes they just switch items. An item I purchased went from 38$ and I purchased them twice to 229$ another 39$ to 58$ it's crazy. Like stop!

Like a lot of people, I order a ton of stuff from Amazon and have been a customer for years. I've never had any issues with it until I got this new app. It crashes, freezes, and generally glitches out almost every time I try to look for something or add to my cart. I've tried uninstall/reinstall, clearing caches, system updates, soft resets, you name it with no luck. This app is garbage.

When you want to price check an item in hand and click the camera icon, it defaults to 'search styles'. You should know 95% of us want to scan a barcode. That should be the default. When you do click 'search by barcode' your reader is BROKEN. It is BLURRY. Close, or far. It will not bring the barcode into focus no matter how slow and exact you move to try to focus. It gives a read error. Other retail shopping apps work. Its not my camera that is the problem. It's been months. Pls fix.

3 steps back. Loss continuous scrolling, now opens a new screen for filters, after selecting anything it immediately searches which annoying when you are trying add several items to filter, . and a overall dated interface. It is so bad removed the app. As it works exactly the same in a browser. Please go back the previous version much better when searching.

Used to be a great app, easy to navigate and find what you are looking for quickly. The update was terrible making it take way longer to scroll through item lists and you constantly have to go through new pages (like when setting filters) instead of just clicking a button like the previous version. Honestly, not a good shopping experience and I havent been purchasing nearly as much as before.

I constantly have to sign in again and again. Uninstall/reinstall didn't resolve. Sorting by price:low to high doesn't work; it only strips the results to nearly nothing. Wish you had the ability to see the products tab on a store's main page and also the ability to search within a department. Other than that, it's easy to navigate

I had multiple problems with the app, missing items that were included in the order, and customer service is good ONLY until you need to return an item due to Amazon scewing up a shipment. You also cant leave bad feedback about their constant mistakes, only about the items you ordered. Plus, even if you follow their guidelines they still get to approve or deny your review on the site before it gets posted. I never had a problem with them until the last couple months.

Slow to load. I'll tap on an item image 5+ times before the image opens up (this is when i want to take a closer look at the item.) Takes multiple taps to get out of the color or other version popup when a product has multiple options. Theres always an obnoxious red notification dot in the upper left. Distracting. And finally, the most annoying of all; the compare wishlist "drawer" that keeps coming back on the bottom of my screen. I don't want it, I don't use it, and I will never use it.

it's a good app, but there are a couple glaring design flaws. For example, if example I'm searching by album I only need to see each album one time. I understand that your trying to engineer addiction by copying slot machine mechanics, but in this context all you've accomplished is reduced functionality. Also, if a song title runs too long and is cut off by an ellipses, if I turn my phone sideways it should display the extended title instead of blowing up the size of the album.

Latest update made shopping very difficult to navigate through the filters. The user interface visually looks like an improvement but is not user-friendly at all. Searches used to be all in one drop down menu (on Android) and you could make multiple selections a time. Now I can only make one filter selection at a time then I'm taken back to the narrowed choices to have to go and filter again. Overall shopping searches seem slower as well. Not impressed. Was a great app before update.

This new "Amazon Shopping" experience app is a tad glitchy. While I can understand Amazon's efforts to update the app with a cleaner design, conceivably I feel it makes my search results that much more convoluted and difficult to sort through. The wish list functionality is atrocious. The old app made it easy to rename and manage the lists. It takes too long to load (and my phone is newer and speedy with everything else). If we can bring back some of the old functionality, that'd be great.

The app is slow. I've been a prime member for half a year or so and I order stuff fairly often. eBay, Lowe's and home Depot all work just fine, full speed and no issues, so I don't think it's my phone. whenever I'm looking at a product with different color options or bundles etc, it almost freezes, that's how slow it is. it's really frustrating. definitely not user friendly.

Super buggy and poorly made app. Does the absolute minimum to function but feels like a beta that just came out. Pages are constantly crashing so get used to seeing the "sorry, something went wrong" page a whole lot. Even when pages load they usually crash within a couple of seconds. Spare yourself some pain and just use the website on a computer.

The app is alright, a bit buggy. The issue is the barely intelligible outsourced customer support and inconsistant package tracking. Paid for overnight deliver, took a week. ( Package lost somehow) Asked for refund in amazon credit, 3 hours to get credit, since a new item would not be available for several weeks. Ended up getting refunded to my card, 7-10 business days to clear.

I love Amazon, it's a great app However it keeps crashing. At check out, if I try to change my delivery then after selecting it, I get stuck on a loading screen which never finishes loading. I end up having to open Amazon online rather than the app if I want to change the delivery of my order. Now it also crashed when viewing products. I.e if I click that button which shows the same item in different colours/sizes etc. It will once again get stuck on loading. Amazon may be Good, the app isn't.

Of all the things I love with Amazon, this app lets them all down. Searching is clunky and awkward to use.. and forget it by department. Then there are too many ads getting in the way, sponsored or otherwise. If I search for Bose, I don't want ads for others I'm never going to buy spoiling the search results. The web page in a browser is easier by far. Amazon dump this app as it's useless!

App is laggy and basically stops working if used for an extended period of time. For example, after browsing for a while, if I tap on an item to see details, the screen goes black. Sometimes it just starts glitching. I try scrolling, but nothing happens. Sometimes I can go to the previous page and tap on the item again to see the details, but most of the time I have to restart the app. It's a pain in the ass to have to redo your search with filters over and over again when this happens.

Very unresponsive. A fairly frustrating way to filter Amazon search results. The filter menu is very, very slow to open (if it opens). It must be opened every time a new filter is added. Sometimes, you might click a second time, just to find that the menu opened and now you've clicked "Clear Filters." This puts you back to square one. Amazon, please do better!

Used to love the app. Now, filtering a search is an absolute pain. Have to tap "Filter" a few times to get the page to come up. When you finally get there, don't make a mistake with the option you select because going back takes you back to the search results rather than the filter option again. If you apply more than one filter (who doesn't?) you have to apply one at a time through a very laborious process. Now I shop Amazon less and when I do, I use the mobile browser in desktop mode... Sad...

Has pretty much everything I'm looking for, although, sometimes it gets confused or turns up no results, prompting it to suggest something completely different. If I have an issue, there is a part of the app where you can contact someone for help, but the bad part is, when I asked the question, I didnt get a real response (which only partially helped and gave a refferal and a link to try and fix my problem, which never really got resolved) and didn't get any sort of response for ~3mo...

I really enjoy using the Amazon app. I absolutely, 100% detest the new filter version. Not only does it stick sometimes and when I push it again it will clear everything, but it takes me longer to filter through what specific items I'm looking for because it continually takes me back to the search menu. I just want to stay in the filter menu sometimes. I hate it. Please allow us the opportunity to do filters the old way.

It's constantly freezing. I'm always putting in a "fix" request but obviously it's getting ignored because this has gone on now for months. It doesn't matter if it's the shopping app or Prime video. None of my other apps have given me any problems . Easier just to delete them anyway than the hassle it's been giving me, including the horrible delivery service lately.

This app is so buggy that when using it, I have to apply insect repellent to my phone. One main issue is the list tray at the bottom of the screen, which is a great concept, if it worked correctly. When it does show itself, most of the time it's blank. Changing the list only last a minute or so, then randomly changes to another list & constantly changes my default list. As big of a company as Amazon is, you would think that they could afford to pay someone to fix the issues.

The features in this recent Android update are terrible. One of the best things about shopping on the Amazon App was continuous scrolling. I can't stand using the next button. The filters are not good either. I wish there was a way to set default search parameters for your account. For instance it would be nice not to have to click the prime button every time.

Is Amazon trying to frustrate members into leaving? Seems so. 1. Correctly spelled search terms ("block") are auto-corrected to different terms ("black") mid-search, resulting in irrelevant and erroneous results. 2. "Oops" pages occur every 2 to 3 searches. Cannot return to the previous screen when an "oops" appears, you must return to the home screen to start all over. 3. Filters are impossible to apply and disappear mid-search. 4. Successful searches return only a set number of results.

Don't like the update. I liked being able to scroll continuously through the search results. Now having to click "next page" over and over takes the fun out of it. And if I want to go back to look at an item, good luck figuring out which page it's on. The filter is ridiculous as well. I don't like having to click on it multiple times to add filters. It was better before when I could click one time, choose multiple filter options, then apply them all at once. Can I have the older version back?

Not bad, unless you want to sort the results of anything you might be looking for, then this app sucks! You can get hundres to thousands of results from a search, but when you try to sort the results by price (lowest to highest, or highest to lowest) all the sudden you're given only a handfull of results, if you're lucky! I know filtering is supposed to reduce the number of results, but not sorting. Makes this app pretty much useless unless you want to buy what Amazon tells/wants you to buy.

I usually don' leave reviews but this new Amazon app is horrible. It crashes and also goes to a blank white screen when trying to view an item. This is very frustrating when you've gone through 50 items out of 800 and it crashes!! The older version had its glitches, but it wasn't nearly as bad as this new one. I've been trying to use now it for about 30 minutes and it's glitched in 1 form or another at least 6-7 times. I stopped my usually enjoyable shopping experience just to leave this review

The app feels fresh and updated compared to the last one, as well as organized. My only issue is it really seems like a work in progress, as it's glitchy and laggy, and sometimes the links/buttons don't respond (for me, at least). It's not TOO annoying and I love Amazon, so I plan to keep using it, but it would be nice if it ran smoother.

While liking the app and most of it's features, I feel that the bar code reader need lots of work. I use it to compare prices when I shop B&M stores. when it works, It takes a while for it to focus. Moody of the time i give up in frustration. I've used the Walmart app for the same and as soon as it's near the barcode, I get the decoded info.

With every update to the UI, the app becomes harder to use. What I remember in the past was a fast and relatively lightweight app that I could easily navigate and find what I wanted in no time. The most recent update broke the filter tool. It takes so long to set up now since I usually have at least 3 or 4 filters set. The amount of time it takes to find what I'm looking for using the filter, along with the overall degeneration of the UI, is enough make me shop elsewhere.

This app sucks! The older app was so much better and simpler to use. Aside a bunch of unnecessary garbage, that you just don't need, since I got it about a month and a half back it has crashed on me and messed up my phone. I couldn't figure out what the problem was until I went to the 'device maintenance' tab and there was a notification about an app issue. Sure enough it was this one. It was causing my battery to drain and gunk up my phone with potential malware. You've been warned.

Searching and filtering is so hard. The app changes over time. The most recent change is to the filtering, and it's driving me nuts. You can't choose multiple filtering criteria without navigating through all the sub categories and waitng for the page to reload after every selection. Search results have always been designed to benefit sellers, and somehow the crappiest ones. It's getting worse. Amazon knows it's a fixture and that we won't jump ship, so their concern for our experience is gone.

The app is pretty no-frills. I constantly get my deliveries sent to the wrong address, it would be nice if when you receive a photo of your delivery, you could confirm it was your house and not a neighbors. For shopping, if you are looking for something specific, the search functions are adequate. But if you aren't exactly sure, navigating and browsing aren't very intuitive or streamlined. For example, it would be nice to open items in a new window.

I keep having problems with the Amazon app. Sometimes can't change delivery address (country) to browse, it just tell me to restart app, but still it wouldn't work. Other times when I'm browsing with foreign currency, it keeps jumping back to US dollar when I'm entering a new page. And that 'one click buy' is really confusing, once I accidentally touched on it (phone sliding off my hand), then it shows I've placed the order. Amazon is great but the app is very frustrating.

Dear Android developers working on the "filter" feature: the feature is a downgrade since the last update. Too many clicks are required to apply multiple filters. The screen switches far too many times. For those working on the frontend, its gorgeous as per usual! Even with the multiple clicks. Backend: page transitions are a bit slow (as far as that filter feature). Perhaps I over-filter, but I would love for the Search and Discovery (perhaps) team to return this feature to pre-update version.

It used to be a great app then...they changed it. The search results used to be scrollable vertically now you have a few results and then you have to click to the next page. This is a pain especially if you are trying to compare products on two or more pages of said results. Also if you do search and change the way it is sorted mysteriously some or most of the items disappear from the results. There also seems to be more ads for sponsored products in the newest version of the app.

Newer update & changes to the app are horrible! It's now too difficult to navigate, slow, & lags. You can't scroll endlessly through your search reaults. Now you get about 5 results then you have to hit 'next' page. Far more difficult to save to your lists. Before you could hold & drag to the bottom to your selected list. Now have to click to open then heart items. Way less personalized. Until they fix this, guess I'm done using it to shop for awhile. So disappointed.

I used to be able to click on the picture for whatever I was looking at to zoom in. Now it just shows a white screen when I click on one. I've also started noticing that some questions are completely irrelevant to the product I'm looking at. For example, looked at a posture corrector and there were questions related to a pump on a Craftsman tool and then other questions about a table. I've been seeing this one other items too. Just seems so weird.

The app itself works pretty great and has all the features a normal buyer needs. I've used this app for well over a year without much issue, until now. I feel like I have to touch the same button multiple times to get the app to load. It's like it stalls out sometimes. It takes forever to load the filters and to add anything to the wish list. What happened to the drag and drop into wish list feature? Please fix the bugs.

It is kind of hard to believe that Amazon would produce an app this bad.  It is actually one of the worst I've ever tried-- especially when compared  with the Amazon website.  I couldn't find a way to navigate.   There is a menu to go back to the home page, so you can have the pleasure of redoing your search from scratch.  Seriously? No back button?  If there is a way to navigate it is hidden really well.  The sorting features are mostly missing.  I couldn't find a way to filter by size, department, manufacturer, and etc.  As we all know there are a LOT of products on Amazon, so lack of sorting makes for a painful shopping experience-- takes forever to find stuff.  I definitely won't be shopping with this app.  I immediately deleted it from my phone-- it's a total waste of storage space.

A step down from the Underground version. The filter options are not as uniform nor are the results always what you searched. And then 20 results are all you get until you go to the next page. It's odd, I thought for sure that the app that we are all being forced to use now would have a more user friendly interface like the one that was recently discontinued. Maybe it's a way to keep us on the same version, I get that, but maybe update it with better features?

I love amazon but this app is really disappointing. it constantly crashes and gives me an error screen that says "Oops, something went wrong." This seems to happen everytime I attempt to view a product or view different sizes/colors/options of products. I have used this app for a long time and no matter how many times it updates this problem occurs repeatedly.

I keep having to reinstall the "latest" version over and over. This used to be my go to shopping app, but since the influx of tiny Asian clothing and sketchy products I am concerned with the company as a whole. Prime used to be a good deal, then they want you to pay for the music, when most of the songs are unavailable. If you pay for the music sometimes your music is greyed out and it tells you that it is unavailable. Please improve your service.

What happened in the last update? The search filters menu is now a separate page instead of a little side menu and every time you click something it goes back to the search results so you have to do that over and over to set filters. And now instead of the search results being one continuous list, you have to click through page after page of just a few items. How is that an upgrade?

This new app just looks like a flashier reskin of the old one. I'm guessing they bundled their other services in it so it would have a built in video/music player... Of course, I didn't need to waste the space on my phone for that since I don't use those services, this app drains more battery than the old one, and will not run as quickly because it's more demanding. Way to be just like everyone else, Amazon. Way to only look at your biggest market share and give the finger to everyone else.

Use this app a TON, but it's suddenly stopped allowing me to click to enlarge product photos. The little round, spinning timer just keeps twirling at top of a blank white screen. Restarted phone over & over, rebooted app, nothing has worked. Works fine on husband's identical phone. I don't understand why this is happening suddenly. I did nothing different. Afraid to delete & reinstall app. I have thousands of items stored in folders & in my cart. Don't wanna lose it all. Years worth of stuff.

When the app works, it's great. However, the vast majority of the time, whenever I try to search for something on the app it will initially load the page, but seconds later will load the picture of a dog with the words, "uh-oh, looks like something went wrong." I have this experience both on WiFi and 4G connections. I would recommend just using their website instead. Don't waste your time trying to get the app to work.

if you dont have amazon prime it defaults to the standard delivery in the app (which costs and takes one day less than the free delivery), if however, you try to change it to free delivery - available on orders over Â£20, the app freezes and wont let you continue, so if youre ordering in the app only you will probably have to pay for delivery. or open the browser and continue from there. it also vibrates when you add something to the basket, which can get annoying.

It takes way to long to move items around to different lists, especially for mobile. For example, when you want to (save) an item to a list on AliExpress, you can do a long button press to chose which list you want it to go to. That doesn't exist on Amazon. You have to change your "default list". So many extra steps for seemingly no reason. However, everything I've ever received From Amazon deserves nothing but praise. Unlike Wish or Aliexpress, Amazon cares about their customers.

Won't even open. Tried reinstalling. No dice. Not to mention their new filter system and sponsored products that aren't even related to my search are really annoying. If you filter by price low to high it's all across the board. Thought maybe it was including shipping costs but nope. You now have to click to see the price from "other sellers". If you return something you have to select return to credit card for each item instead of Amazon credit. Sketchy Amazon. Really sketchy.

Horrible after update! I am a huge fan of Amazon and I use the app a lot. But after the update, I am not happy at all. The filter option is completely ridiculous, only being able to select one thing at a time and having to select filter again and again is too time consuming. I don't understand why they would change the filter option, it was perfectly fine before. The app has also become very unstable, constantly freezing or crashing. Which makes it incredibly difficult to make any purchases.

First time I've ever felt compelled to write a review. This app is useless. Every time I open it the app says support will soon end and gives an option to install new app. Clicking only takes you to the same app in the app store. Sometimes there is the option to upgrade sometimes not. Upgrading seems to make it worse. The app does nothing but crash now. Total piece of expletive!

I love Amazon, but the app could use some work, some of the Chinese competition is far ahead in certain terms (AliExpress, Taobao, etc.). Better recommendations, improvements to filters (like filter for how much discount), and most importantly a price that doesn't increase during checkout are just some of the things. Keep on innovating, until then two stars.

The latest update removes the prime filter for search results . I never buy anything unless it's marked as prime. Without the filter it is a total pain to have to go through all the results to find the prime items. Since I purchase items from Amazon multiple times a week this is really annoying. This makes the application almost unusable. I guess I'll use the webpage until it's fixed. Really, really, annoying

Ever since the new update I absolutely hate using the shopping app. Here are some reasons why: 1.) You can only see about 15 items per page now. You can no longer scroll through the results as fast as you'd like. 2.) There are all kinds of BS advertised items in each page that I don't want to see. 3.) If you search for an item and get back 423 results and try to use the sort function (price high to low), over half of the results just disappear. It's painful to use this app any longer!

I use this app more often than I would like to admit. The app is generally good but Amazon's customer service is deplorable. I'm not sure if it was just a language barrier or a general misunderstanding but I went through five different agents (without being warned of the transitions) and none of them were able to assist me in my request (to have my subscription item delivered early). After an hour of being bounced around and not getting anywhere I just told them to forget about it.

this app does not work at all, on the main home page it breaks and re-directs to a verry unhelpful error page that only says "uhoh something has gon wrong on our end." it has been like this for months, ive tryed re-installing, re-logging and neither of them worked. it also seems that quite a few other people are having this issue as well. i feel this greatly reduces how effectivly people can shop with amazon because not everyone has a computer (yes the site works just fine on pc).

The filter feature is very annoying and frustrates my efforts to use the app. Typically, I want to use several filters at once: price low-high, 4 stars reviewed products, prime, and a the precise department. To achieve this one has to go in out of filter each time, as a filter can only be applied individually. Extremely frustrating.

Terrible "upgrade" The latest version makes me want to go shop in a brick and mortar store. I can't easily add products to lists, the filters are inefficient, using a filter makes it HARDER to find an item, and the limited number of items per page wastes so much time. I wish there was a way to uninstall the latest version. I miss my daily dose of Amazon instant gratification.

The past 2 days the app has been completely unusable. Soon as you try to open it crashes with option to send report etc. I have had to wait until I can get to my PC to make purchases so my order was just put in and it screwed up my delivery date. I have spent a lot of money over the years with Amazon and the rates go up and more problems seem to surface... Time to rethink about my supplier.

It's okay. this app used to function really well for me, but lately, it hangs and crashes frequently. I makes it frustrating and hard to browse products. It's like every time they add a feature, the app gets clunkier. I don't need Alexa support on the app. What I DO need is for the app to find things fast, load them quickly, and let me compare my choices easily.

It's kind of shameful that this app is so buggy. There are times when it won't open. It worked fine this morning and won't open this evening. It also did that a lot during prime days back in July. The wish list feature at the bottom of screen is buggy, often it doesn't load and sometimes it's not even visible. Of all companies, Amazon should not have an app with these kinds of issues.

Functional app in most areas, but has an annoying bug (which has been around for months and still hasn't been fixed) where full size images fail to load when selected. The loading wheel just spins indefinitely and you have to hit the back button. Please fix this Amazon, it's really annoying!! I also wish there was an option to continue shopping when halfway through checkout if you remember something you missed, rather than having to hit back several times to do another product search.

The app was great before this last update. Now the sorting removes items from your results therefore forcing you to waste time seeing things that don't match what you are looking for. This is a total disaster. To make matters worse it only allows you to select one filter option at a time so you have to go back and repeat the same steps multiple times just to select things like size, category, dept. etc.

Latest version doesn't work right. Slow. Search filter menu doesn't appear when you tap on it. I think it is invisible. Previous app worked great. What happened? Please fix. UPDATE: Still sucks. Can't change item color because menus freeze. Scrolling down a list of items will sometimes add items to cart. Had a $1000 of merch in my cart that I didn't want. PLEASE FIX!!!

This app has gotten horrible, I make a list so I can drag my stuff to it and when i come to see the list has changed to another one, then I look for the one I had put in the first place and it doesnt load, so i have to close the app completely, open it back up, put the list there again and look up everything AGAIN!!!! It happens every 5 min or so, to damn annoying!!!!! Im so dissapointed. I love shopping amazon but this has made me cut down on the shopping.

Garbage Performance Wise Amazon itself is amazing, I love it. The app however is utter garbage. It's very slow and laggy at times, and doesn't feel as good as it could and should be. It kept me in a loop when selecting quantities, which left me missing out on deals. I restarted the app multiple times, cleaned my cache, boosted my ram, closed any other inhibiting apps, and it still has these problems. I have the s10+, so it isn't the phone or my connection. I have tested both on data and wifi.

Dearest Amazon, READ YOUR LATEST REVIEWS! It's frustrating to have to click to view more on the search results instead of just scrolling through an endless list. Even more frustrating is the irrelevant items that appear in search results. I miss the drag and drop to the floating wishlist and had hoped to see it return with the last update. Instead, you chose to make the app less user friendly. Please fix!

Great place to get cheap stuff, but don't subscribe to any items. They often change the price later so instead of paying $12 bucks for a case of drinks, you're suddenly paying $18 with no notification of the change. I previously ordered something which was damaged in the mail, and received a notification essentially telling me they knew it was damaged and would not replace it. If you have a better place to shop, do it. But unfortunately the company is huge and literally buys out its competition

The recent updates have made the app less user friendly and more frustrating due to the way the filter button works. Previously you could filter search results really quickly all in one go and make a purchase really quickly. Now it only let's you filter one thing at a time and if you want to narrow it down further (or want to rectify a mistake) you have to start again from square one. Many times I have given up on a purchase due to this. Why change a very good function and make it worse?

The app is ok for the most part. The search engine is some better than it used to be. BUT, the tray should be optional. If you shop by phone the tray takes up a lot of valuable real estate on a small phone screen as opposed to a tablet or laptop. You close the tray and as you shop it pops back up again. If I hide it I obviously don't want it on my screen. Amazon can make the tray optional for those that don't like it. I would rather wait for a Wish delivery than be aggravated every time I shop.

Used to be brilliant, but since the last update it is much less user friendly. The lists have a next button to press, it used to add more items automatically when you got to the bottom of the list. The filter function is annoying now. After each selection it does the products, you used to be able to add more filters before going back to the list. It also crashes, it never used to.

What did you do, Amazon?? Why on earth would you change to a page by page system?? This TOTALLY ruins this app! I really hope you fix this! I love buying from Amazon. I've never had problems being a prime member, and it's well worth the cost. The app is far from perfect though. I wish someone would fix the filters, because it never lists them correctly. I wish that notifications about prices changing, would have links, not that we have to search for them. And now this page thing, which is awful!

Not usable! When I start the app, first I get asked to choose the right amazon (using amazon.de), then I should login. Login is not possible, because the app says I have no internet (what is not true). then I skip the login and get surprised with pics of dogs with the sentence "Oops! Something went wrong". This error was first seen last quarter of the last year! Errors may happen, but not repairing them is IMO the worst thing.

Garbage update. What is this "from" bullfeces! Oh this item starts at $8.99 but when you look at all the sizes and color options, $8.99 doesn't exist! All the items you are able to see start at $16.99. BAIT AND SWITCH PRICING! IT'S VERY TIME CONSUMING LOOKING AT ITEMS AND WAITING FOR ALL THE PRICING, SIZING, COLOR INFO TO LOAD ONLY TO NOT FIND THE PRICE SHOWN IN THE SEARCH LIST! Removed scrolling and replaced with next button eliminating knowing how many items are left.

I had this app for years with no problems. About 4 months ago it started having a pop up screen to tell me the app had stopped working. The screen comes up even when I'm not in the app. I have tried to uninstall and reinstall several times. I tried shutting off my phone. Nothing worked. The last straw was when it stopped my GPS while I was driving and I missed critical information. I have now uninstalled and it will remain that way until they figure out the bugs.

The app itself is slow. It often won't even register when you click on something. And freezes up a lot. Was hoping there was an update I missed, that would fix the issue. But there's no current update. It's pretty annoying when I am trying to shop for Christmas and Its super slow, and don't alwatsy register when clicking on something. Amazon itself is great. Love Amazon. But the app isn't so great

Major Flaws. My main grievance is the inability to scroll through pictures on reviews. I used to be able to do this... But not anymore. If I want to look at pictures in reviews, I have to click on a picture but then cannot just scroll through by swiping (preferred) or clicking the next arrows on right/left of pic (prev this was available). To go back by hitting back button takes me two screens back and I have to start all over. And no zoom on review pics. Yuck. (Samsung Galaxy S9)

Ugh, Amazon. What have you done to the app? You've tinkered with the UI and made it awful. Did anyone UX test this? It's now dog slow. Getting into filters takes a couple of taps before it eventually lumbers into view. This is not good enough. It doesn't matter how pretty it is if it's unusual. The app should be fast, responsive and streamlined to let me spend Â£Â£Â£. Instead, it's like you don't want me to browse and buy stuff. It's actually faster for me to browse your mobile site! Needs fixing!

I enjoy using the app but, everything has turned into and feels forced into Prime now. I've noticed most of everything I want to purchase never has any free shipping anymore. It's really rare to have a free shipping option. I can't afford to get Prime. Amazon has really taken over, stores have closed down. It just makes me sad. Things are no longer the same anymore. Amazon was cool before but now it's gone too far. I've started to just buying local products in my state or near me.

WORST CUSTOMER SERVICE I HAVE EVER EXERIENCED!!!! I am so disappointed and frustrated with the experience I had when I needed a replacement order I have canceled my membership and will no longer use Amazon at all. I was a very active and loyal customer for two years and depended on them to help make my new life as a single mom easier. It really did until I had a problem with an order. Horrible communication problem in their customer service department. Online and on the phone

The sort by price function is useless. removes almost all the results when sorting by price. I have ended up not buying from Amazon because of this on a number of occasions. Changed my rating after update and trying for some time.. one of the worst shopping apps now. filters and sorting are appallingly bad. Very frustrating. It's like being forced to look at only what Amazon wants to push.

Since a recent update it, the filtering is laggy. Also, the screen shifts due to showing/hiding your address line (so you end up tapping screen - which gets buffered ..... so when it wakes up you have actually pressed somewhere different!). It's not good! I even tried re-installing. Why oh why did they roll this out? So close to Xmas, either fix it quick, or, roll it back please.

I use Amazon a lot, and app was great. Until this version where results are now in pages and you see lot more sponsored items appearing per page. This makes finding what you want much harder, so much that I'm actually writing about it. Also filters can be better (but that's the same on the website too) Realtime tracking is helpful (introduced a few versions back) having an app feedback would have spared this 1 star review. Bring the pageless scrolling back and I'll make this app a general!

It's not just the app. The Amazon website dosen't make sence. For example, if an item is listed as $8.40 and I click on it to add it to my cart the price immediately jumps up to $12 or higher. All prices are in Canadian dollars so I don't understand why they do this. There are tons of things about the Amazon website that are shifty like that. It's a completely dishonest company that seriously needs better standards and at least some percision. It runs on complete chaos.

LOVE AMAZON, but this app is horrible for searches. It doesn't retain the filter from one page to another. I refine it down to 98 items, and when I'm forced to go to the "NEXT" page after only seeing 20 items, I now get a page with 80,000 items and the filters are gone. Also, it starts out with thousands of items, but just by having it sort by price, it cuts it down to hundreds. Why when it's not supposed to filter anything out? PLEASE FIX so I can find what I want to buy.

The app needs overall improvement. Tje recent update only allows you to select a single filter then it closes. If you need to select additional filters you have to keep going to back in to drill down to what you want. There is no back option in filters either so you cannot go back to the previous layer This used to work much better. Also if you try to sort your selection by price, for some reason, the number of selections you received in your search will change.

Performance: Feels like a web app. Constant lag in the UI, the animations stutter, and there are frequent white flashes between screens. I have a high performing device. Wouldn't be surprised if the app actually uses a webview internally. UI: Many small issues. Lists unintuitive, you need to click on the tiny link in top right to see all your lists. Hamburger menu slides out to right, but goes down when you dismiss it (??) Conclusion: Probably the worst-designed shopping app I've ever used.

Something is wrong with the most recent version. My app keeps refreshing/reloading the home page. Impossible to search for anything and buy it. Restarted my phone and no luck. Uninstalled the app and downloaded it again and no luck. Mind boggling...this is one of the biggest companies in the world. How could a glitchy version be released???

Terrible! Crashes every time I try to open it. Used to access it often to add things to my cart and make purchases. Cannot view anything. I just give up and buy stuff somewhere else. I pay extra for a Prime membership that I can't access unless I log into a computer. Most of my shopping was done on mobile devices. Fix the app or lose more customers.

Why do amazon apps suck so much? If i want to do shopping on amazon i basically have to wait until i can use a computer for it (which i only have a work computer atm). An old amazon app i had used to work fine but after being told i needed to update to this, I'm constantly running into problems. Like links/products that can't seem to be clicked on. Lots of little things that will get messed up that add up to making it too much hassle to bother with.

I used to think the app was easier and more efficient, I've noticed, over the past few years, that there is a price difference between desktop and app. Today I ordered a lower resistor assembly for my truck. On the desktop the price was $9.67. On the app it was $24.97. The app keeps track of my spending habits. If I put in several large orders, I notice, I see price increases on previously viewed items. If I buy used for a few orders, I notice price decreases on previously viewed items.

Amazon is typically a great company, but some items don't have a refund option for one and for another they randomly were charging my credit card a day in advance without warning on items I didn't owe them. Had to shut off my card because my account had no mention of this charge till a day later and I thought it was fraud. thanks a lot amazon.

I have an Amazon warehouse nearby and can see exactly where the Amazon truck carrying my package is at the moment and how many stops it has left until it gets to me. Not applicable to everybody, but the app handles this feature really well. Also, in my experience, the app is actually a bit easier to navigate in some ways than the website. At least, the basic design is more intuitive. Also, as a general rating for the Amazon service, I'd also give 5 stars. It's easy to shop confidently.

The recent update is awful in my opinion. The filter options take up the entire screen and only allow you to choose one filter at a time. The search results make you flip through several pages instead of scrolling through just one, making it difficult to get back to an item you considered a "maybe" item. It's very disappointing and I don't even want to use it anymore which is sad, although my husband will be happy I'm not shopping anymore.

Old UI was much better and friendlier. Could set all filters in one shot. Now it's only possible to do one at a time, even where multiple choices are possible (which isn't clear because they're radio buttons too; something covered in UI Design 099!) Furthermore, sorting results don't come out the way one sets them. It's embarrassing!

Good looking app, good UI, very easy to use. Great for tracking order status and handing returns on-the-go. The only time I would choose to use Amazon on the computer over the mobile app is if I'm shopping for items and I want to see the selection on a larger screen (along with the easier usage of filters). But for everything else, this app is excellent.

SOOOOO SLOWWWWW!!! I don't know what it is lately, but the app is so slow. It takes almost a minute to even get the filter button to drop the list. The reaction time is awful. Also, what ever happened to being able to set multiple filters at once?? Now you have to click, wait for it to think, wait for it to load, THEN GO THROUGH IT ALL AGAIN just to get three or four filters. SO annoying!!!!

The new filter screen is worthless and spoils the user experience. I have to press back key couple of time during navigation between search result and filter screen. Moreover now a days many mobile don't have navigation keys, user experience on such mobile has become cumbersome. Unless old filter menu comes back I am not buying anything on Amazon.

There are some major issues with the wish list feature. I am beyond annoyed that the wish list does not notify you when an item increases in price. The app notifies me when the price goes down, but not the other way around. This is a major issue because when I add things to my wishlist, its usually because its a good deal. I do not want my sibling spending $200 on a purse thats worth a fifth of that price. Bottom line is Amazon should be honest about their prices fluctuating.

the filters and sort feature are useless. you can set a price range or 4+ stars but you're still going to get many options outside of what you're actually looking for. putting things in order of price also does not mean the lowest/highest will be first or that they will even be in ascending/descending order. you have to see what Amazon wants you to see in the order they choose.

Had to contact customer service because I was having issues searching for various style of a product. It was infuriating to get bounced around to 3 different people who could read all of the previous messages and be told to try the same things I had already stated were not working. Issue still unresolved. I've also had repeated issues the the lists function and switching between lists while searching that have regularly forced me to restart the app and hope i can find what I was searching for.

Having major navigation issues since last week: - takes 2 to 3 taps to trigger 'Filter' button. - once a filter option like "Avg. Customer Review" is selected, it goes back to search results thus again having to tap 2 to 3 times to acces filter page. - Sometimes if 'Filter' button is tapped too many times in frustration, it'll register taps 3 steps ahead and hit 'Clear All'. Very very frustrating

really disappointed with the last update - searching and filtering is now much more cumbersome. Every time you select a filter it takes you back to the results whereas you used to be able to select multiple filters at once then apply them all. Also now you can only select one filter option for some categories - for example instead of searching for shoes with two ranges of heel heights you can only select one at a time. This is going backwards - not an improvement.

The new interface sucks. The drop-down menu is useless. I can't navigate to what I'm looking for. As soon as you hit one option you're taken back to all the articles. I want to be able to click more options like in the old app. Also just 20 articles per page and then you have to click 'Next Page' is irritating. It used to be that you could scroll down indefinitely. I noticed that I close the app sooner than I used to and start shopping elsewhere. 3 months later and it's even worse now.

Disappointed in the application, not the Amazon service. Recent updates have made filtered searches hell on earth. It reloads the whole page every time you open the filter menu and make a single change, as opposed to how it was before, when you could make multiple changes and implement them at once, saving time. Additionally, the button for the filters is buggy, most times it doesn't work. Incredibly disappointed that they took a step back with their mobile application...

Used to have no issues at all with this app, but suddenly it's buggy beyond words. Constant freezing, crashing, and error pages popping up without warning. I can't go 5 minutes without having to restart it. It gets old fast. EDIT 12/23/19: Almost a year later and still having the exact same problems, my dudes. I'm taking one of my stars back.

FIX THE SEARCH!!! The search options are terrible. A basic search gives you thousands of results, and many of the featured items aren't even related. Plus, as soon as you change the sort from featured to something else, your results drop to 25 or 30 (especially when you use 'price low to high'). It's ridiculous and annoying. You're losing a lot of business, based on my conversations with others, because most people don't have time to wade through thousands of items to find what they want.

I usually really like this app, but recently it has been refusing to load anything. I just the the "oops" screen. While I like looking at cute pictures of dogs, I don't get on Amazon to do that. A lot of times I have to turn off my VPN. Your browser site has no problem with my VPN (nor should it), but sometimes I can turn it back on and everything is fine. I think you have some bugs to need to fix...

Amazon App went from being a VERY useful app to I'd rather remove it, including my PRIME Membership; - Added page-by-page results, really? - drag-and-drop to wishlist no longer available - App crashes and/or freezes constantly, I have a Samsung Galaxy Note 9, don't blame it on the device! - Once you go back to your search results, it sends you to the beginning, this is a pain! - Item(s) price is misleading, shows a price and after clicked, that price wasn't even an option anymore AND MUCH MORE!

The app is wonderful, mostly because I always have my phone and I don't have to carry around the reader all the time. I always worried about losing it. They work together too. Drawbacks, a couple.. First, in the last 24 hours it notifies you the sensor will expire, EVERY HOUR, DAY AND NIGHT. I cannot find a way to modify that. I have to kill notifications. The other, I can't put it on all my devices. You get one app and reader. Other than that it is amazing. Please change those and 5 stars!

A little glitchy here and there. It's a good app, but I don't like how it lags when you try and delete something from your wish list. It seems I have t restart the app every time it does that because it won't load properly. I mean the UI and navigation in this app are mostly great, but those few moments of frustration do happen, mostly involving the adding, creating, and deleting things from wish list.

Love ordering things, love Amazon itself but this app is the worst. It freezes WAY too often. Every time I click on something, actually. Drives me nuts. I don't know if this is how Amazon operates or if the app is infested with a bug of some kind. I wish they'd fix it because thanks to this feature, I bought the same thing twice in one purchase and now I have 80 bags of chips with mixed reviews on its way (last straw. Had to say something).

Love Amazon! I've ordered from them so many times I cant even count. Only had 2 lost packages in the years I've been using them, which is fine, mistakes happen. They always told me right away when their was an issue with the delivery so I wasnt waiting around. They always went above and beyond my expectations making the situation right. Amazing customer service, crazy fast delivery, great prices, and very user friendly website/app interface. 5 Stars!

Ive been using this app for years and its slowly got worse. Adding an item to your wish list, you can drag it down into your wish list bar. But your wishlist bar only appears randomly! Deleting an item from your wish list, forget a quick response. It will WAIT, and sometimes FORGET to delete it. The app search doesnt search ALL items in store. I was after a watch. I only found it, because Bing found it first. Giving it 2 stars due to quick purchasing. I have a nokia 6, withupdated os and app.

Overall, I love the app. However, the drag and drop feature has become quite frustrating. I change the list and it says loading for an eternal amount of time. Our it changes so I drag and drop but everything still drops to the first alphabetical list I have. Then I have to go back and change lists for all the items I thought were dropping to their proper list. Way too time consuming. Please fix it. Thanks

Worst Update Ever I love Amazon, but like so many other people have said, this most recent update has been terrible. I don't like to complain--I'm a positive person--but it takes forever to set up filters on searches. I love the diversity of items available, but when I'm searching for something in particular, that variety is disastrous, since it takes forever to narrow 20,000 items to something manageable and pertinent to what I'm looking for. The next button is frustrating. And it's so slow!

Clear the cache to stop the crashing that prevents it from opening. To all the 1-star ratings today...it's not the latest update causing the issue, as mine started crashing before I installed the latest version. I installed the update to try to fix the problem, but it didn't help. I went to the app properties and cleared the cache, which fixed the issue. I did not have to clear the "data" as well, but you might try it if clearing the cache doesn't help. Good luck!

Hate the colors; the teal and white is hideous. Why are you dropping support for the other app in favor of this one? I also can't delete things off my wish list. When I click the text, nothing happens. I can still add notes and move the item to another list, but the delete function doesn't work. Barely just started using this app and already hate it.

Filter settings don't work properly, they take ages to load. Can't set price range if you don't select the category first!!. And even after selecting the category, I can't customise the price range. Besides, if during an order I'm typing somewhere (e.g. text on the gift message), switching to another app (even for a millisec) wipes all the text. Apart from the left-hand menu, the whole interface needs redesigning. The wish list section is badly organized. Overall: definitely needs improvements.

This app is so glitchy. It freezes for no reason when trying to add things to the cart. It won't auto log me into my account and I have to log in before every purchase and deal with the annoying "get free 2 day shipping" ads when I already have prime. I don't see a point to having this app when Amazon already makes it super easy to shop in your mobile browser.

Amazon Shopping used to have an older app before they swapped over to this one and I swear the older model was more reliable. Ever since I had to upgrade to this one, it frequently crashes and freezes. Even though they stopped supporting the old one, I may try switching back to that one again instead since I never had a problem with it. This app does it's job when it works.

Giveaways need work. Whether viewed in the app or on a computer, the Giveaways list needs to show what you've entered and what you haven't (maybe a simple check mark in the corner). For those of us that try to keep up with them, it's a waste of time to have to click every one to see if you already entered it. Such a simple change would mean the world.

In general, UI loads and functions like a bulky app from early 2015. The wishlists UI loads and functions like a MySpace back in the day, you can't multi-select, you can't drag n drop, you can't customize or sort how u view the items within the lists. Overall,very lazy app, focused more on advertising, and trying to make u buy more than you need, rather than helping you find what you wanted to buy in the first place. Facebook, which has much more media content, Loads 100% Faster than this app

I was forced to quit using the Underground App & had to move to the Amazon Shopping one. OK, fine. But then they "upgraded" the app & now it's HORRIBLE! The search repeatedly shows me mostly discontinued items, & there's no way to drill down to eliminate things that I don't want to see. I will be uninstalling the app & switching to the web version.

When you are conducting a search and select the filter option, it takes a while for the options to pull up. When they do pull up, you are not able to select multiple filters all at once. For example if I want to see all new items with 4 or more stars and prime shipping, once I select new items it takes me out of the filter section and back to the products. I have to complete the steps all over again just to add to the search 4 or more stars.

I'm not sure if or how this app is superior to simply using a mobile browser. I was trying to manage my ebooks. This involves pop ups. On mobile?! Pop ups? Really? The pop ups are very slow to load (I'm on home Wi-Fi) and extend beyond my phone screen (original pixel). In order to update my ebook, I have to click on a button off screen. So, basically useless. Uninstall time.

Aug 6 App Update HORRIBLE!!!! I buy from Amazon multiple times a month and spend a lot of $ there but the ease of the app is gone. I might stop using it until this is fixed! The FILTER no longer has specific options. i searched for curtains n I didn't even get to choose if i wanted solid color or pattern so i had to weed through literally thousands I didn't want to find what I wanted. Now im ordering from WAYFAIR instead!! & the results only show like 15 at a time so I have to keep hitting next

The app is no longer showing price change summaries for items saved in my cart whenever I click on my cart. There are always price changes shown , many times a day , normally. This stopped happening about 3 days ago or so. I know some of my items have changed by scrolling through the list and looking. Update - definitely an app issue as I can receive the price summary updates using the browser on my phone.

They keep taking features away. I can't change how I view my results, as in I can't change it to list or grid. The text is way too large under the product pic so I can only read one line of product name. Now we can't select all the filters you want at one time, have to pick one, then reopen filters to pick another. It's horrible. I'm sure I'm forgetting other things too.

Latest update was a mess. After opening the app, the "Home" screen loads OK, but I can't open my Shopping Basket, or my Order History, the screen stays white (empty) and won't load. This happens like 9 out of 10 times. After reopening the app, it doesn't take long to "crash" like this again. I can't even change countries, and I used to buy from 6 different Amazon countries without problems. Please fix or just undo the latest updates!

I got this app since I use amazon a lot , and I regret it. I had a perfectly fine time using chrome instead. I've had times where it crashes repeatedly and it will keep saying "Oops, something went wrong", as much as like 10 times in the same minute. It just gets frustrating after a while, it becomes such a hassle to get what I need when that pops up so frequently. Uninstalling and heading back to chrome.

When adding items to a specific wish list, the app is adding the item to two lists. This is very frustrating, because then I have to go and remove each item dividually that was added to the wrong list. Please fix this issue. Also, a few days ago, an Amazon courier delivered my packages to a completely different address. I responded to the "How do you like this photo" question stating that the location WAS NOT my home. Luckily I was in the area and was able to locate my packages. Get it together.

Everything Amazon tells you is a lie! I have never had an order from this miserable company arrive on time, in full, or correct. Two stars because they do eventually send you what you pay for you just always have to remember that any date of arrival listed on the app or their website is a blatant lie and will not be when it arrives. This goes for their delivery tracking as well. And if you try to call them out on it all they do is offer you a credit to pretend the service isn't garbage.

Gets worse with every update!!! Spends more time throwing sponsored items at you & trying to target your search results than actually helping you find items. The filters go away after a few screens and you're back to hundreds of items instead of the few you had narrowed it down to. I'm using the app AND Amazon less and less because it has become such a PITA. And why did they take away the floating wish list bar?!? So convenient and the only thing that made using the app tolerable for a while...

I do buy stuff from amazon but your stupid app gave no option to opt out of prime or clicking out of it by forcing me to be signed up. I thought I can by pass it by clicking past the ad when it was a sign up sheet. I was hoping to keep that free trial to test out when I really needed it. But no! Instead of respecting the customer's needs you force them to sign up so they would pay out of pocket for a monthly fee of two day shipping after the trial when they might not buy that much every month.

New update sucks. I prefer to see it all on one page without having to scroll left and right to view everything. I have gone to setting to try and change it back, however no such option can be found. It has made my shopping experience much less pleasurable. *edit* I have now disabled because you can't fix anything. Thank you for ruining my shopping experience. I'll be using the web browser now instead of the app.

Love Amazon, but as other reviewers have noted the search filter only allows you to look at one category+select one filter point before kicking you back to the results list. Screens take forever to load+are unresponsive until they fully load. Sometimes buttons are unresponsive, but subsequent clicks often results in the app selecting an option for you which is then difficult+time consuming to undo. The website works better than the app, but the app auto loads+closes the website. Uninstalling.

UI feels clunky and very slow. Constantly tapping wrong things due to slowness in loading. Search and filter options are sub par. When searching for a specific item, my results are generally filled with unrelated products and advertising. Always have better search results when using Google Search via web browser which helps expose better pricing options outside of Amazon.

When the app works it is great, makes shopping very easy and I like the format. The problem is that more than half the time I get my search results then an error message pops up saying something went wrong and to go back to the homepage which also has the error message. When that happens there is no way for me to shop or manage anything in the app.

I absolutely love Amazon, this review is only about the Android app. Plain and simple, the app sucks. I don't like having to click next in the list of results. In the app world what site doesn't allow you to just keep scrolling?? There also used to be a shopping list I could save items too with easy access to go back to them. I am not sure why this was removed but it was awesome, bring it back. And viewing the pics in reviews is really cumbersome. Disappointed by the app.

I feel this app has been, or is getting, slower and slower all the time. Product pages take forever to load, making it impossible to add a product to your wishlist or cart without first waiting several moments for the page to finish loading. When you are looking at several different products, back and forth, this is a problem. Editing your wishlist is also near impossible. Tapping the button to get the drop down menu on a wishlist item only responds at least 10 sec after you press it.

Search filter practically unusable. Don't know what has changed. But after tapping filter button, it takes a LONG time to respond. Tried clearing app cache and other measures. Nothing works to fix. Then once filter finally comes up, allows you to choose only ONE search parameter, before returning to main screen. To select several filters can take me 5 minutes or more. Absolutely terrible. Will have to start using another shopping site.

I've used the Amazon shopping cart to track prices for years. Whenever the price changes I'd get a notification of the change when I open the cart again. Whenever items dropped in price I'd then buy them. For the last two months the cart no longer shows the price changes. So I've just about stopped using the app and likely haven't bought near as much from Amazon either. Their loss....
