Fix the search!  Fewer Sponsored ads & NO pages, just the items please! Jeff Bezos is rich enough that the apps shouldn't have to display the ungodly amount of ads that it does!

New app is terrible. Now when I do a search it shows 20 items, half of them are "sponsored" and have nothing to do with what I'm looking for, then I have to go to next page with the same issue, huge waste of time. Feels like Facebook click-bate. I buy a lot of items through Amazon, rethinking that now. Bring the old app back!

Amazing online shopping app but I just hated the delayed items. I feel cheated when an item is being delay for a few more days especially when it is a two day shipping item. I do understand that the weather can play a huge role in it but come on. the weather has been nice all week. There are no snow. I'm just probably upset about it, but I will update on my review after more experiences.

App always fails to install..... Then the website is incessantly nagging me to try out the app..... Very annoying. I cannot believe Amazon has such a bad user experience for shopping filters. You can only select one brand,colour etc. Also why can't I filter to exact price range rather than selecting defaults.. Also why the heck is the 'clear all' right above the filter selection as ppl can mistakenly click that. Also the app is not very snappy. Very bad experience overall

Update: Removed one star --- Seriously, when are you guys going to fix the search filter?!? This one selection at a time thing is really making me hate this app. --- The last update changed the filter screen, which is now super annoying and time consuming. Nope still broken. So annoyed! The app opens once I download it. As soon as I put in my region (Australia) as required, it crashes. Not a fan of the new update, specifically the changes made for the filter options. In this new update, the filter process is less smooth and more time consuming because it almost takes me to another page separate from the results. After each filter, it takes me to the new results so i have to redo the whole process for each filter I add.

It's okay. My largest problem with this is it doesn't have an option to put your name on packages (specifically for Amazon pickup orders not orders sent to your house). I share my prime account with my family, so it'd be really great if the option existed. The old app has this option. It'd be nice if it made it onto the Amazon Shopping app too.

Hi. Thanks for a great app. Awesome. (BUT) Lately it's bin lagging. Ive never seen it lag this much. Please update. Very annoying, when you have to wait till something pops up. & it's not my phone. It even does it using Wi-Fi. Good Wi-Fi at that. Just saying, in case you guys think that it's something to do with the connection. Because it's not. Thank you. PLEASE UPDATE.........

I've used this app for years with absolutely no problems up till now! Whenever I search then want to filter the search I'm continuously tapping filter before anything happens, then when it finally opens I select one filter and I'm back to my search and then have to start tapping filter again till it decides to work! When I'm finally able to look through the results I want and I click on an item sometimes after clicking back it will return to a previous search and I have to start all over again!

More streamlined means much less functionality. Search features and filters have been gutted. For example, you cant just go to the pants department and narrow your choices by size, you have to input a search term before it allows that, and then you discover that the selection that Amazon was once so famous for is just not there. If you arent looking for the most popular or common version of sonething, forget it. Way to go Amazon, you ruined what was once the best online store.

This app was working just fine on my s9 Samsung....then a couple months ago it started acting up. Everything is big so can only see a small part of the page....wont scan over to see rest of screen. I cant place any orders cause wont load the item to see details....I get a blank screen other then the top that keep acting like it wants to load then doesnt. this app is constantly crashing! ive updated, uninstalled and reinstalled, anything i could think that would help and constantly get the "oops something went wrong" notification. i tried to use the general amazon app but was told support for it was ending and i had to use this app. now im taking up space on my phone for an app i can use maybe 30% of the time.

Not overly impressed with the updates. It seems categories are different for items now and search brings up a ridiculous amount of items completely unrelated to what you're looking for. I especially hate that I have to now hit 'next' or 'back' to view more items, as opposed to the previous continuing pages. It takes too long to load the next set of items, and I look at less items because I assume if it isn't on the first page, you don't have it.

The sorting price by Low to High feature isn't good. You have really allow Amazon NOT to do the searches if you're looking for low low prices, do a search multiple times, and scroll for best results. Adapters, and plastic electronics like such, should be 1 cent plus shipping but sometimes it's hard to see/find the low bargains.

Caused Pop Up Ads to appear when using all apps in phone. If I opened my phone app to make a call - pop up ad. If I opened my text app to send a message - pop up ad. Became too annoying so I uninstalled. Please limit to only occur when using the Amazon app only, and maybe I'll re-install. Shame because I'm a frequent shopper on prime & this would be more ideal than going to the website direct. This didn't happen with the old Amazon app.

for such a huge company, you'd think the app would work better. you cant access wishlists, it craps out constantly, and is just generally unresponsive. save yourself the space on your phone and just visit the website *Edit*. Since leaving this review several months ago, the app have become more user friendly, but I just discovered that the carefully planned Christmas budget I had and been blown up, because I assumed that all items on the AU app would be in AUD, but apparently not

Let me start by saying I'm a programmer. The new filter is HORRENDOUS. You're forcing me to select each filter, load the search results, then select another filter, load results, etc. This is grossly inefficient. I'm almost 100% certain they're doing this on purpose to test consumer behavior by determining which filters are more important and the order in which they are selected, so I'm hoping there's a long term benefit here but right now the filtering mechanism is not great.

I've edited my review from 5 stars down to 3, because the app has begun to glitch on the saved lists. Latest update has ruined it. Gone is the shopping list tray where you can drag items (which I used all the time) and absolutely hate having results paged. Why couldn't they just leave the app alone! As someone who is physically unable to visit shops and carry items home, I rely on home delivery for everything and always loved the app, until now.

I do like the app. It makes shopping easy, but it can be glitchy. Sometimes it loads really slow other time I cant search anything. Recently it started merging my lists or changing them on it's own. Sometimes they dont even appear. Love the app when it works, fix the problems an I give it 5 stars.

I really love amazon but lately it's been having a lot of issues with my orders, my orders have been delayed even though I pay for amazon prime. So many issues lately. I love shopping on Amazon. I didnt have prime and had issues writing reviews and no one could help me. This COMMUNITY is a mess. I have been prime for 2 months and now another problem with reviews I already wrote and cant find. I'm not happy. And no one has answers.

so I downloaded it a couple of months ago & I kept getting this message that said amazon assistant has stopped (I think part of that feature is when you can tap a product, then drop it at the bottom of your screen like a save for later) & that's big for me. so I hope it gets better now that I updated it. other than that I love amazon

Nice shopping experience, although I hate that when you try and search for sexual adult products through the application, it only shows a few items, even if you try to refresh it. App stopped working for me a few weeks ago (I can search for items, but when I select one the screen continually refreshes and will not load the product information) and submitting an error report to support through email has not gotten a response. For the past several weeks, the app has been non functioning. I have restarted my device multiple times. I have uninstalled and reinstalled. It does not matter what I do. Update2: Filtering has been improved and wish list appears to work on iPad and but not her iphone. Updated stars but will stop using app. Smile amazon com should just be an option in the app, no technical reason for it not to be. Use browser now

Although I'm a huge Amazon fan, I have always hated this app!! Since the November 11, 2019 update I can not access the filters. I click filter, nothing happens, I click it again & it opens and closes OR it opens, goes to sort & once I select a sort setting goes back to the search results instead of the filters so I can only choose 1 filter at a time and it's probable not the options wanted to select from.

You can never truly "uninstall" this app. even after doing so, if I click an Amazon add with something that looks cool, it always diverts me to The Play Store to download this app instead of taking me to the Amazon otem listed. The App was horribly limited. using it always left me frustrated trying to find stuff that I could so easily find on Amazon's main sight. If you have never installed this app, Continue to avoid it! You will regret it otherwise.

WISH LIST (banner at the bottom) stopped showing after the last update (Ver. 18). Can't drag-n-drop items into lists like before. Downgrading back to ver. 16, kind of brought the list(s) back. Also, the search results from the app are much more limited than searching the amazon site via google. Lately been doing all searching on google and putting things in my cart, just so I can see them in the Amazon App. Am using Samsung Galaxy S9/Verizon running Android 9 (Pie).

Used to use it extensively, but it feels like quality has slipped in recent months. Their sort features have really taken a nosedive when looking for specific items. I recently started looking to buy a comforter and no matter what options I chose it would almost always show the same products. My assumption is that there's no quality checking going on. Sellers can pick multiple features, regardless of whether their product has it or not, to attract more customers with no repercussions.

Was not bad until they added the drag and drop to wish list feature. The app is impossible to use. All I do is scroll and bam, dragging and dropping items. Not holding down any more than 1/4 second. Now my list is full of junk and Amazon thinks I like the stuff so decides to recommend it. The app was inconvenient enough to use already and is now useless. No option to disable it either, only hide. Goodbye Amazon App, and maybe Amazon altogether. #shoplocal

The app's usability has decreased a lot since the last few updates, now it doesn't automatically switch currencies when going back to Amazon US, and it keeps changing my preferred delivery address. I liked infinite scroll way better than pagination. Filter search now sucks, and every time I choose a different delivery address it closes and reopens. They've "fixed" problems that just weren't there.

Usually a very good app, but today it has been crashing within having the app open for like 3 seconds. I see many people in the reviews experiencing this as well. If it is not fixed, I'll be cancelling my Prime membership. I rely on my membership to get things I need quickly that I can't get in my area. Please give us updates on when it will be back up. Edit: Tried reinstalling it and can't even log in. Please fix. I spend good money on this membership.

SO. SLOW. Locks up constantly when loading anything, images take 30 seconds to load for no reason, then even longer if you want to view a higher quality image. Locks up when selecting a color or size of an item, locks up when I add anything to my cart. Seriously, it's just awful. A hundred billion dollars and this is the best you can do? Absolutely terrible app.

Glitchy update. Scrolling limit is a joke. Clicking a next button after seeing a handful of items is time consuming and kills the shopping experience. Putting sponsored items ahead of well reviewed or high quality items is shady. What does sponsored even mean, except that some company paid a premium to be #1. The App also crashes everytime I open it now. This is the worst update ever. Wish I could go back to the original. I buy a lot on Amazon. This seems like a leap backwards in App quality.

Instant crash. I Can't use the app anymore. When it did work Sponsored products are annoying. Products should be viewed based on its ranking with customers not paid slots. I get it if Amazon prime is free but i paid for the membership, do not advertise to me. I might as well cancel my subscription because my savings from shipping will be offset by time wasted and subpar products.

The app itself is buggy as heck on my Galaxy Note 4. The buy it now and add to list buttons rarely function without closing the app and reopening it. It often freezes up. My phone is not the newest version, no. However, thats no excuse. Amazon's app is the most buggy app I've ever downloaded on this phone. Unacceptable, for this to come from such a company as Amazon, whose standards should be extremely high. Everything else about Amazon, however, is top notch. Its just this app is horrible.

This app used to work perfectly. Now, over the last few months it's become almost impossible to filter search results. When I hit the filter option, either nothing happens or search results or taken right back to non Amazon Prime items. This goes on for several minutes & sometimes never corrects itself. Please fix!

The biggest problem with this app is when I get a notification from Amazon, highlight it, and swipe my screen, up comes the notice that this app is no longer supported. If then displays a prompt to upgrade, and when I hit it, it tells me it's already installed, says open app, and then goes to the front page not displaying the item that was highlighted in the notification. This is a real pain!

This app works very well, and has never failed me. It has pretty much become indispensable at this point. One caviat: it does tend to freeze while shopping/browsing, but this occurs very seldomly (relatively speaking), and a quick quit and reopen of the app resolves it 1st time. Very valuable app, but mysteriously it makes my $ disappear. ðŸ˜Ž

I've thought this app was hands down the best in the industry until this week when I needed to do some serious shopping... It's near impossible to get it to load the product and information to just view the items. I thought it was my phone but my entire family is having the same issue. Please take a look at it because we all know and love Amazon and have come to trust and rely on Amazon as the key to huge selections and savings. Aside from the app everything about Amazon is a home run!

Idk what's going on with the app over the past month but every time I start it up its like I'm using an old computer with windows 98 and its freezing. Like how hard should it be to just start the app, man? Its so frustrating I haven't been buying anything. It's turned to be barely functional. I start it and have to wait like 30 seconds to be able to use the search bar and even then it just ends up not responding.

I bought one computer part and it keeps popping up with notifications of deals on the same type of computer part. Like, guys I already got it, that's not how shopping interests work. Now notifications are off. Is my stuff at my front door? I'll have to check like it like I've time travelled into the distant passed of before the smart phone. Other than that the apps works just like the website. I prefer to shop on a computer anyway though because it's much easier to look at multiple things.

App is virtually unusable on Samsung s8. Filtering limits to one choice at a time (going back to the search results, even if you need multiple filters). Also, there's a long delay between clicking the filter button and actually showing the menu, and if you accidentally double- click between the filter and it showing, it erases all filters, dropping you back at square one. This is inconvenient at best, but usually downright infuriating.

Being disabled is really tough and I really depend on Amazon to get all my supplies to me including food and other items. The only reason I gave it three stars is that they now have canceled my account because I couldn't answer the security questions that really didn't have anything to do with anything as they can clearly see my credit card numbers as verification as well as my identification, address, as well as the last items that I bought which was the only question that I can answer correctly

Slow app, lots of bugs. Every product page takes forever to load images. The buttons are all very laggy. When I press add to cart, it takes sometimes more than 10 seconds to respond. Tried to check out today, and the 'Proceed to Cart' button was just stuck on a loop that kept taking me back to the same page. Going to try the mobile web version to checkout and if that fails maybe my laptop. Bad experience with this app.

It's great for finding & ordering basically anything you need, but searches for non-specific items can be EXTREMELY frustrating & chaotic, especially when trying to do price comparisons btwn several similar/identical products, & further complicated when you have 2 decide btwn better price vs longer ship times-even WITH a Prime acct, which is NOT made clear (exmple--My daughter's X-Mas was RUINED over a purchase I made that, while it was the best price, order DEC 21st didnt arrive until JAN 3rd)

I have Prime, and that's the best thing about Amazon. However, this app is kind of terrible. If you like to browse, add stuff to lists for future purchasing, it crashes after a few minutes. The floating default list adds stuff from other lists to itself, and most of my time is spent removing those items bc they don't belong in that list. Then the list disappears, won't allow new things to be added, then the app crashes.

The app server appears to constantly crash. error message appears with a dog "Uh Oh something went wrong on our end" been like this for months. Even if I try to shop on the web browser it constantly opens the item up in the app, then crashes. I can't even shop on the web browser. please fix!!!

Over the last year this app has gotten steadily worse. There is such a delay when selecting any of the search/filter options. The first press on "Filter" lags, thinking I didn't press it properly I press it again, then it switches to the filter page but then immediately selects "Clear all filters" and brings you back to the search page.

Ordered an item via Amazon prime. Not only was the item being shipped to the incorrect address, it never showed up on the guaranteed date. All of the reps were helped and when asked to speak to the supervisor I was told that they"couldn't get in touch with one" and was constantly placed on hold for a span of over 30 min. I was offered a refund. Which didn't satisfy me at all. I would've preferred my gift. On time. To the correct address. Or maybe a chance to speak to supervisor. Something.

When using one-click to order an item, the item is double ordered and I have to cancel one order. This is the third time this has happened with Amazon and happens each time I use one-click. I have called each time and Amazon hasn't been able to provide any data about app usage or from which device the item was ordered. Customer service response on this issue has been found wanting. This is a major bug and will burn you if you order an expensive item with one-click.

they purposely try to force you to buy what they want you to buy if you search and sort list. It's ridiculous I had over 2,000 search results when I searched. then i sort the price low to high it went to 44 results. then I selected the prime slider and it went to 3 results. when there were plenty of results on the original search for prime. I thought the Walmart app was bad but that one is just slow but shows all the listings. this one's got it beat for worst app hands down.

Amazon? *sigh* The thing is, you have to save payment info on your account in order to purchase anything. Someone hacked into my account and made a $50 digital gamecard purchase. I talked to multiple employees at multiple levels online to see what I could do to secure my account. Although I never asked for a refund, just wanted advice to secure my account, all anyone could do was tell me the $50 was nonrefundable. I deleted my payment info and will never order again, not that they care.

I have recently tried to update the app and the update failed many times, so today I deleted the app and tried to reinstall and it does not work. I tried many times. I also followed the instructions to delete the app cache and restart the phone and that did not work either. I have Xiaomi Poco phone f1. ----- Edit, months later and still does not work and no response from Amazon.

(Informational Purposes Only) (Dev Please Read) I have been in long standing with this app on my phone for quick purchases, however, now this has come to a hault due to the fact that it has become too demanding with hyperlinks and ads for items within the Amazon shopping ecosystem, making it hard to purchase, search, and or add to a list without being forced to use my desktop to add something. My suggestion, limit the links and ads and or add a "Suggested" tab... please and thank you in advance.

It wasn't great at all. I bought quite a few things from amazon and i can say that fast delivery is the only good thing about it (if you're a prime member). Most of the items you get are damaged which is a hassle to keep sending back. Some times they even suspend your account and not give back your money for a long time without responding to emails.

please fix the list tray! I have been using this app for years. it wasn't until the latest update that I started having trouble with the list tray on the bottom of the app. it constantly switches my list so when I try to add an item to it it's going on the incorrect list. it's very annoying it needs to be fixed ASAP

I really like the app. However, I am NOT a fan of the recent update to the Filter options and the addition of the next button. The previous Filter was just fine, you could select multiple filters without having to go back in to select each one. And the continuous scrolling was great! Who wants to press next 20 times!

For the several years that I have been a Prime Member. I have been extremely satisfied with all aspects, from searching to purchasing to deliveries, to returns/refunds and customer service. Appreciate the prompt manner in which any issues have been resolved. Also thankful for their reasonable pricing when compared to other apps. Highly recommend. Haven't upgraded to new version due to negative reviews. Will update after I am forced to and use it.

There's something wrong with this app. As soon as any page loads, it quickly turns to an error page saying "uh oh something went wrong on our end". This app has become literally unusable. I've tried deleting it and reinstalling it and still the same thing. Before this started happening it was great. Please fix asap!

Good app but false advertising I use amazon all the time and when i saw you could get up to 25$ in coupons just for using the app, i downloaded it right away. I read everything on it, including the fact that it takes UP TO 7 days for a first time app user to receive a coupon. It has been weeks since i first downloaded the app and after almost two weeks with no coupon notifications to be seen, i uninstalled it. I only just recently reinstalled it because the mobile site is full of bugs.

Woeful ui update. The clear filter button beind the filter button invariably leads to you clearing filters when trying to add. The ability to select one brand at at time is a joke. You have to leave the filter, press the filter button and select second option and of course you end up clearing your filter as the filter button has lagged and the clear button issue happens again. Then there's the requirement to click next within the search as opposed to the scrolling method previously, why?

Amazon experience is quick and easy, and the app is handy. However each time I open the app it keeps telling me the version of the app is no longer supported and I have to update, which brings me here and it's already the latest version. Although only a minor inconvenience, its just frustrating.

since the last update, my app keeps crashing every time I try to search for something. I have uninstalled and reinstalled. Twice. I have turned my phone off, and back on. I have ran updates and diagnostics on my phone. I have left 3 different detailed feedbacks about this problem. so no, I am definitely not impressed with your app.

They have many items to offer, but their Prime membership delivery sucks. Multiple times they don't deliver the day they are "guaranteed " to deliver the items. Then they let you know 2 hours before the time they are suppose to. Their customer service is not in this country, USA, and they can't speak for themselves, just a script. If an answer is not on their script they just ignore you and repeat the same information over and over again, like 4 or 5 times. They are getting bad!!!

This app is trash. Every time I open it I get an image of a dog saying "uhoh something went wrong on our end". Clicking the button to go to Amazon home reloads the same screen. Sometimes you can get glimpse of the Amazon store or items in your cart after clicking on that link, before another dog image and uhoh message pop up. I have reinstalled the app, logged out and back in, nothing has helped. I would love a resolution.

I have had to uninstall and install the app multiple times. every time i go to search a puppy comes up and tell me that something went wrong on their end and i have to return to amazon home. i cant search anything on the app. i have to pull it up in chrome on a web page instead of the app to do any kind of shopping. its getting really annoying not veing able to use the app

This app is so unbelievably sluggish... I can type in what i wanna find, hit search, then its a waiting game, a full min later, finally it pulls up items, then I want to filter the results, so I press the filter button, nothing happens so I have to tap 3 or 4 more times and 2 mins later it pulls up the filter page. now i only have two departments I can choose to narrow to, all, or computers and accessories which has nothing to do with cell phone cases, which is what I searched for.

"Dont fix what isn't broken." This new updated app is the dictionary definition of a bad update, that breaks the system. I don't know what is worse. The fact the app runs about as fast as a crippled snail? How all the buttons don't seem to work 90% of the time? Or that the original app store is bloatware that can never be uninstalled and will forever take up space on my device that I could have used for a dumb game or dozens of photos. I'll be sticking to using the browser website for now.

This company has done everything in its power to cut corners and cheaply fill orders. They promised me a credit of 5 dollars to use on products sold and shipped by Amazon and yet when I went to order, of course the credit didn't apply to my order! How convenient. I'm sick of paying for a shopping service that doesnt have free next day shipping for prime members. They can just give it to USPS and then it doesn't get delivered on time and they think it's not their fault.

I use the app the whole time, but the latest update shows only 10 search results, meaning that I have to click and then wait for the next 10 to appear - and go back if I want to see earlier results. Amazon, you are not that amazing at finding what I am looking for, don't make the experience even poorer! Update Now, if I go away then back to the app, it doesn't show me the product I was looking at and when I find the product again, it's more expensive than it was seconds before!

Amazon is now injecting video ads when searching for items much like Facebook. If I did not pay for prime, fine, I understand. However, I pay for prime and I should not be subjected to instrusive ads that play automatically. I feel like Amazon might be gearing up for a tiered approach to prime. Also the app has been really slow lately.

This is the worst version of the app! when I search for an item it comes up with 319 reviews, as soon as I sort by price, I'm down to 9 results. What?! I just want the 319 results SORTED! And I added a business credit card to my account for 1 order, specifically unchecked the box saying "use across all of amazon," 2 days later my business card was charged to renew rental textbooks that were returned 6 months ago! That was an unauthorized use of my card! So frustrating!

Nice for online shopping. The only big problem is when I surf on the Flash sales page: some pictures are disappearing while scrolling. Like 10-20 items have a problem, then the next pictures are there for like 10-20 items. Then again, no pictures, pictures back, no pictures, pictures back,... It's not practical (and that's since a while). Nexus 5x user

This app has taken a nose dive. I'm a long time Amazon user, and lately, starting up the app and clicking the SEARCH FUNCTION causes it to crash IMMEDIATELY. I can view my old orders just fine, but anytime I try to use the SEARCH FUNCTION causes the app to crash WITHOUT FAIL. You can imagine how frustrating that can be. FIX THIS.

The app is so in your face! "BUY THIS!" pop ups. Pushing Alexa-- "Alexa, when is my order ready?" Taking me back to my cart every minute and even posting the cart items on the page you're already on-- jeez! It often skips what you were doing and bugs out. Since when did Amazon get so desparate? There is no way to go forward button back to where you were. I'm using the current app and only it asks for an update today, so it's not a review for an older version. This app has always been like this.

My recent experience using the app has been of an annoyance! I did a search on an item and 1/5th of the search results were sponsored unrelated (never did a search on any of those items) ad items! As for delivery of items, I've ordered enough to qualify for the free shipping, why would it take a few days to actually ship the items (order status shows items have not yet been shipped)? Because of this, I started doing most of my shopping on others sites like Ebay!

Having a lot of the same issues other users are having, though decided to give Amazon Prime another shot for the Christmas Shopping season and selected it to remind me the day before to cancel. Though what does it do? Not remind me and charge me for the monthly subscription that I cannot afford at the moment and now I'm going to have to wait 3-5 days for the money to go back to me plus charged me $13.38 instead of the 12.99. So done with this company ðŸ˜

Harder on my processor than a 60fps 3D game. Can't select multiple filters at once. Filter tab rarely opens on first try. Products priced "from $X.XX" are never the price advertised in any size, shape, or color. Viewing images for size/color varieties decimates CPU. How about saveable filters for size/department/etc? Decent UI, I guess.

It's a good app, but I've noticed recently that the descriptions of the products are being cut off. The 1st line is clear but many times the 2nd or 3rd lines of the description are cut in half- you only see the tops of the letters. This is annoying because then I have to click on the item to read it and it may not even be an item that interests me. Then I start get recommendations based on what I'm viewing...

I downloaded this app because Amazon was offering $10 if you switched. I was never credited, and when I chatted with customer service, first they said they would credit me $5, then after I balked they offered me the $10. WHICH THEY AGAIN NEVER CREDITED ME. I'm super disappointed with their shady tactics and how customer service has apparently gone by the wayside.

Really retarded to pay for a service and then get a bunch of ads on their app!!!! The app that came on my phone was Awesome because it had no ads on it. Then they discontinued it and forced me to dl it from the play store where its riddled with ads like a virus. I pay monthly for Amazon. Members should not have to deal with a bombardment of ADS!!

Yes it is possible to make purchases on this app. However, it is near impossible to navigate because of the intense lag. It goes so slow, and is so buggy that often times you have to close the app and open it again to get the buttons to work. I highly advise you to just order off of the desktop website. Needs a LOT of work.

Functionally the latest update is problematic. I have issues with the using filters, I hate that so few items appear per page, and that i now how to press these big Next/Previous buttons. The search engine is bizarre in that some of the results are just so badly wrong, it'd be hilarious if it didn't grow old very quickly and impede the search function. I have to say it had always been this way, it's not confined to the latest update. Finally, the app just does stops working as it has hung.

I do not like the recen changes in the app. It makes you scroll pages and has removed several of the sorting options. Now everything is listed as the lowest price even though the options you search ed for are not included in the best price options. Very very disappointed. If i wanted to shop on the web i wouldn't use an app.

I love this app and it's super easy to do my shopping, and to navigate. I can do my grocery shopping while comfortably at home. There is also so many categories and subcategories to choose from. I can buy new sheets, towels, comforters, and even a nice storage vanity to put them in. The quality is also fantastic for the prices. I also love being a Prime Member, where I get treated like I have VIP Status and Customer Service. The Prime Channel has the latest movies, shows and Prime Originals.

I closed my Amazon account a couple of months ago and was told that I would receive a credit for the amount I had overpaid and that my account will be closed immediately. However, for the past 2 months my account is still being debited for the monthly fee and I need this to stop immediately because now it has created NSF charges on my checking account because Amazon these were not included when checking the balance on my account. This is very disheartening!!

I love Amazon but the shopping app seems to be getting buggier and buggier...a few months back it started going black and sometimes crashing when I checked reviews and customer photos. I've gotten every update in hopes that it would be fixed, but now it happens every single time. So frustrating! I'll stick with the browser site for now.

The app is OK, but frustrating. When searching, I change the filters and sort order, and when I click on an item and go back, they've reverted back to default. During checkout, when changing postage options, as amazon automatically selects costly one, I just keep getting orange wheel, app freezes and never goes through. I have to keep using my computer instead. This is a recent glitch.

awful. simply awful and limited. tracking is useless. no accurate location of the item. no way to retrieve the pick up code. no communication. you could talk to alexa or whatever which doesn't help. yeah you can buy the stuff you want but don't expect to solve problems concerning your purchases via this app. it will give you no clue but headache. useless.

always works, love the lists, Prime two day shipping essential, return policy makes for a happy experience. loads fast, page is usually easy to navigate. love the prpduct compairsons, when all the info is there. Need to use larger type font and never use gray for font, cant read it. I never buy online of anyone else, just not safe nor as easy.

I find the app aesthetically not appealing, its often slightly buggy with transitions. it's not as quick as it could be against its biggest rival ebay. Lots of blank area not utilised it often misses features you can find on the desktop site and its been this way for years now. They haven't updated the app in any significant way for what must be over 3 years. its functional which is why it gets a two star.

keeps crashing, have deleted cache, memory and deleted the app completely only to reload and have it continue to do the same thing. Tired off seeing dogs with an error message that says uh ooh something is wrong on our end return to home page only to go to home page and it continues to show the error message. Have contacted customer service only to be told to uninstalled and reinstall. the mobile app is junk. IT needs to read the reviews!!!!!!

App has been acting super quirky lately (as has the actual website.) Some pages won't load and buttons won't tap. I can get to my cart, but no matter how many times I tap on "check out", nothing happens anymore. I even tried restarting my phone and everything. Frustrating.

crashes constantly tells me to encounter the problem uninstalled we installed several times have done all the updates. takes forever to load anything I searched for and usually stalls out and tells me it's encountered a problem. I'm running a Samsung Galaxy S7 Edge and do not have this problem in any other app all other apps run quickly smoothly and snappy however Amazon sucks

It works really well for shopping and I use it to get reviews many times. Where it lacks is the barcode scanner. Its almost completely worthless. It almost never works. So I have resorted to mainly using the Walmart app for barcodes. The Walmart scanner kust works so well. Other than that the app seems to work well.

Search is barely functional, there is a long delay when you hit the Filter button and sometimes after you've stopped trying, it pulls up the Clear All option and presses it for you. Other times, it does nothing. I guess it's a good time for an Amazon break.

More unstable every day. It has gotten to the point of not being able to use the app for purchases. Every page I click on takes up to a minute to load. When purchasing at checkout app randomly will change the address and payment I selected. Have been a prime customer for several years, and thinking it's time to cancel.

The old Amazon app was more stable and responsive and overall easier to use and easier on my eyes. I wish I could go back to it. As you must use the web for their Smile services, I dont really use it except for the delivery notifications. I would save yourself a chrome target and move on. Don't bother with this.

App doesn't work on my OnePlus 7 Pro. Nothing loads on the home screen, and then several minutes later, a picture of a dog and an error message saying "uh oh something went wrong, please try again" pops up. no matter how many times I try again, so doesn't load. I've tried uninstalling and re-installing to no avail

This is significanlty worse than the old Amazon app. It's slow and laggy and keeps ramdomly switching around my default settings. I never had this problem with the old app, but after I got a new phone I couldnt download the old one. 2 stars because Amazon itself is great, but this app runs terribly and there was nothing wrong with the old one.

This app is super convenient to use, but please bring back the opportunity to have everything sent through Smile. Now, I have to add things to my cart, then remember to go out to my browser and get into Amazon Smile and checkout from there. I placed a larger order today without remembering, and a charity could have benefitted from my purchase. It was automatic for awhile and now the feature doesn't exist.

App used to always work well but recently it feels almost broken. Changing sizes of clothing garments practically freezes the app and the whole thing becomes unresponsive until the app seems to eventually catch up with one's inputs. A very unpleasant shopping experience and I had to uninstall for the first time ever.

So they promised me 10$ promotion when I install the app .. once I installed, the promotion is not working. Talking to the customer service (after a lot of pain with the AI thing in the chat), they were not able to handle it. So I'm deleting the order, deleting the app, giving it 1 star (& less if it was possible), and will consider any other online merchant before Amazon from now on! so cheap!!

so much worse than the first app, this is just a way for Amazon to force adds on you and every other time you press view cart, it prompts you to sign up for a credit card, or Amazon prime, or a totally unrelated add "based" on what you buy. basically it purposely navigates you from the page you wanted to view. 1 star all day for you Amazon, really should be ashamed.

Was a great app but they unilaterally removed without notice the drag-n-drop feature to a bottom tray wish list - this is very convenient and was one of rhe best features. The new swarch facility is worse than useless forcing you to reopen the search to select each criterion. Madness. Also I had received a version wth a nice colour change to sea green - the whole thing lookes much better and more "classy" and now it's reverted to the old black background. Monolithic silence from Amazon as normal

This rating is more for Amazon's customer service than the app. My store card was cancelled due to failed back to back payments without warning. Tried to talk to someone through chat and phone but they didn't provide much assistance. There is no email service either. Guess I'll have to find somewhere else to shop for a while.

PROBLEM: can't create an account with the email you desire on mobile, otherwise gets "internal error" every time. it SEEMS like it has to be account matching one used to download the app on google play, as that's the only way i got it to work. Was this intentional? because this just makes zero sense to me. I assume this is why some people with existing accounts are having trouble signing in now as well. Please fix!

Unfortunately, for me Amazon prime has become useless. Walmart offers a lot of the same things you can get on Amazon and you can get free two day shipping on orders over $25. If only Amazon would offer me this. Everytime I go to check out in the app after it says this order qualifies for free shipping it then wants to charge me. I also am not a fan of the updates because the app has gotten less user friendly over time.

The ability to limit searches to products with prime shipping only has been removed? Why? I dont have time to scroll through dozen or even hundreds of cheap items with exorbitant shipping that are going to take three weeks to arive from asia with no return policy. This is not the reason I use Amazon prime. looks like I'll be going back to spending my money with eBay until you guys can fix this app

I just ordered 3 items valued at over $400 and when I tried to check out the app gave me an error message. I had to go to my computer and finish checking out and all of my packages were sent to a different state. Even though I double checked where it was being sent to. Amazon has never failed me like this...I'm hoping this happened to someone else I'm sure it was a glitch. CS suggested I reinstall the app.

I've been a Prime member and app user for many years. Amazon simply gives the best consumer experience ever. They've raised the bar a mile above all competition. I love the product reviews. I love tracking a product leaving California one day and somehow getting delivered to me the next in Michigan. This company has completely spoiled us. And despite the bad "big company" box others love to put them in, they've done it on the smallest profit margins possible. They give the consumer pure value!

Filters to help me narrow down to what I want keep leaving the menus. I feel I'm being steered away from what I want to buy into what somone else wants me to buy. This app is degrading from a great shopping tool to a complete waste of time. Unless I already know what I want before opening it, I may as well not bother. Time to fall back to old fashioned research methods I thought were behind me.

Fixed!! Crashes almost instantly. Cause: android P really doesn't like pop up notifications. Fix: When Android tells you "app keeps closing" select app info. Select notifications, then select in app notifications. TURN ALL THOSE OFF. I figured it out when I was so frustrated I just went to the website through Chrome and it was 'notifying' me of the Amazon truck deals as a pop-up. Very poor planning on the development team to not test on current OSes.

Love using Amazon in general however, the phone app features makes going on Amazon tedious at times. When I use the "low to high" filter, most of the items aren't shown anymore. And the new update deleted the wish list drag and drop tray. I don't know why they deleted that feature because it made scrolling through items easier and efficient. You were able to look at the things that caught your eye closer because you dragged them down to the wish list tray. Love Amazon, don't love those issues.

Love Amazon Prime but the App... I like this app when it works smoothly. Unfortunately this app has constant issues with the shopping cart, which I didn't have before. When I delete one item from my shopping cart it almost always shows that I have no items in my cart. I have to back out of my cart and go back in to see my items. What's worse is that the app also randomly deletes my freaking shopping cart entirely. I have to start over finding the items I had saved. It's very frustrating!

Have been a prime customer since 2008 love Amazon. However I can no longer shop effectively with the updated app it's terrible! Slow glitch can't filter as well as I used to be able to. The Walmart app works great they get things here pretty quickly too and prices are comparable if not cheaper than Amazon. Word to the wise Amazon fix your app you run the risk of losing me and others completely to Walmart

Would be 5 stars but the new update isn't that great. The viewing option as a continuous list was much better in my opinion. Now when looking through items trying to compare price or build you need to figure out what pages the items are on and the constant back and forth is a bit of a hassle.

Newest update is garbage. I don't usually write reviews, even if I am disappointed with an APP, however, I expected much better from Amazon. Whoever came up with the ideas for the latest update should be fired on the spot. Prime users who pay the yearly subscription have to fight the endless crashing, losing the infinite scroll, and all the sponsored recommendations of items unrelated to what we are looking for.

Signing in was poor, the captcha had spaces and reflected text that made it confusing. Also required to enter password twice, once to login and then again with captcha. I changed my region for delivery and it signed me out. then would not allow me to sign back in. I rate this app as broken and poorly implemented. For one of the largest organisations on this planet they skimped on this process.

S-L-O-W Since the latest update I can't move things around on wish lists or change priority, etc. Every time it freezes and I have to reopen the app. Also it's so slow that when I tap to add to wishlist, by the time it loads, the button for the list moves and it adds to the wrong one. Lots of slow moving with this update.

Used to be less of a hassle... Harder to add items to my lists, since the pop up doesn't appear on ever item. Also, more time consuming to remove items I no longer want, need, or are interested in from my list. There is no option to remove multiple items at once, you have to remove individually, which in turn slows the app down and causes a lag on my device. Its extremely frustrating.. The app crashes more frequently then it used to as well. Rather then adding more, fix what is existing first.

When adding filters to a search it brings me back to the items after only selecting one filter item. If I want to filter more than one category I need to go back to filters for each selection. When touching the Filter option it takes 5-10 seconds to respond. This also happens when I want to add an item to a list. After I finally get my filters selected it shows there are "x" number of items in that search. When I go to the next page, that number gets higher and shows items I filtered out.

always throws up the "something went wrong" message and you have to use chrom instead of the app. This has been happening so often that i use chrome by default. what is wierd is everything looks to load fine for just a second then the overlay message pops blocking all the content. My guess is the issue is something not even related to what i am trying to do, like loading advertising or something SMH. Razer Phone

Awful, I suspect the amazon purchasing has been hacked. In my past experience with Amazon I have purchased an item and they have automatically taken the money out of my account, now they are saying that they don't charge the account until the day that it is shipped. This is the second time this has happened to me and I have never experienced this when purchasing items before. It posted on my bank, now its dissapeared and im out X amount of money. Christmas is coming, now what am I going to do.

Dirty tactics. Every time I use the app they ask me to sign up for Prime, which is fine. What's not fine is they make it a one touch purchase and don't ask me to confirm it. This makes it easy to accidentally sign up but to cancel it after accidentally buying it is a pain and not easy to do. Of course they make the option to bypass Prime really small and right next to the buy Prime button so it's easy to fat finger it and select the wrong option. Stop being a-holes Amazon!

Why does functionality come and go between updates? It's so frustrating. Now when looking at an order and tapping on an item picture it takes you only into the order and not to the item listing itself. It used to take you to the item listing. If it's an order with many items you only see three items that you can tap on the pictures for when in the tracking. So frustrating as this isn't how it used to work. This sort of thing changes between updates with no indication that it's changed!

Whenever I fill my cart then check out, the screen goes blank and crashes. When I reopen the app, my whole cart is empty and I have to start again. When I click on "my account" again, it goes blank. I have had to go on just the regular wev browser to order my like 3 purchases, and I'm a busy mom, I order from Amazon ALL THE TIME. Wish these bugs could be fixed

functionally the app is supposed to offer a lot. Many features work inconsistently. The lists aren't displaying in order or updating with Amazon. i can't delete it edit them from the app either. Not because it's not available, because when you try it doesn't work.

transitioning from the Souq app has been the worst experience. Such a step down in quality. I've lost all my wish lists, filtering options are worse (can't specify exact price range, limited number of brands in the filter), and the overall interface not what I would have expected from Amazon. Very disappointing.

The filter dropdown is extremely slow and only allows you to select one thing at a time. After you select that one filter it kicks you back to the search page. Then if you try to select the filter dropdown again it is unresponsive. Basically and unusable app if a shopper is wanting to select from multiple items. Please fix!!!!

It sucks! 1 Filters don't work properly. I filtered results in certain price bracket. Yet I still have results below and above the bracket. 2. Naah, filters don't work at all Try to filter by TWO words instead of one. Zong. 3. View doesn't work. My view setting is to show list. Which works. Until I filter the results as after that it doesn't. Have I mentioned that the filters don't work?

please add the option to change standard adress, send a present once, now amazon saved it as my standard and I have to change every single f time. seriously.. who was like "'set to default' nah we don't need that button in the app", in my opinion (I'm a programmer) if an app can't do everything the mobile site can, then why download the app? at least in my browser I can still switch to Desktop-site and have all the buttons back :/

My first time using it, I had a problem with the product. By calling costumer service and getting help from them, everything was cleared up. They were all so helpful and understanding, very friendly and amazing costumer service. I would absolutely reccomend this app!

right now with the new update I can't even stay in my app, I click to open it and immediately I get the crash error and then I'm kicked out to my homepage. Hopefully Amazon can fix this with the new update or a bug fix. When the app works properly it's a great app and customer service is great.

The shopping aspect works fine and is easy to use but the tracking of deliveries is utter rubbish. It shows where the driver is but is super inaccurate I've been waiting for 4 hours for a driver to arrive who is supposedly 8 stops away from my house and looks about 2 minutes away on the map. Otherwise the app is great

What have you done! This used to work just fine now you had to fiddle and it's all gone t.ts up. It's a total pain to use now. Eg it only shows a few products on each page. The filtering just fails, the sort options are at the bottom of the list....Please restore the old version and sack someone.

The app is generally very good. But 2 problems have left me frustrated by it everytime I use it. I have had things delivered to my Mum in England and now the delivery address is always set to her location. I have to change it every time and I have almost purchased something and had it shipped to her by accident because it never saves the address I want. The other issue is that when scrolling, it's very sensitive and if I stop scrolling it takes me to the product page even if I haven't clicked it

I don't like this new form. so much easier to rate items with the old site. WHY do people think they have to change everything. if it's not broke, don't fix it.!! I purchased a pen, twice, and not happy with it at all. can't even rate it on here. Not going to install everything that comes down the pike.. This redwood pen stinks, a waste of money.

i have prime but it is not working. the item i am trying to buy is eligable for prime, but i still have to pay extra for shipping. it sucks because i am getting cheated out of my money. i have to pay more for shipping than for prime. Also, it doesnt tell you shipping. it only says, "Free shipping on orders above $25" THATS NOT WHAT I AM LOOKING FOR!!! i often have to buy an item and cant even see the price before that! this sucks. i cant use amazon cause i dont want to accidentally spend money.

First, I hate the Amazon delivery service. I never had problems with Amazon deliveries before. Now packages are either left out in the open and not at the secure location I specify on the order or are tossed in the general direction of the right location. The photos do make me laugh though as they  show just how bad a job the delivery person did.  Second, there is either a big problem with the package delivery mapping or my delivery person is doing some shady non Amazon business. I received an alert that my package was on the way. I opened the app and it said there were 7 stops before me. Over the next hour when I re-checked the app it still said there were 7 stops but I saw on the map that the driver was making multiple stops. Two hours later the app finally said I was the next stop. As I looked out the window for the delivery truck it started raining hard and I saw an Amazon truck drive by without stopping. I received a notice that my package was delayed because of the weather. If I had been the 7th stop when I received the first alert, the package would have been delivered long before the storm.

Adding vehicles and sorting by vehicle quit working in this app. Knocking off a star for the fact that tapping on the filter button seems to do nothing half the time. Sometimes it does actually work but it lags so bad that it takes a minute to register on screen. For the first time in a long time it's just easier to use your site in a browser than to use your app.

Uninstalled as it decided to pop-up marketing notifications, which I hadn't said it could. The potentially more useful notification about my Amazon locker order being ready for collection didn't link to a scannable barcode so I had to open my email to get that anyway. Really can't see any advantage to this app over just using the website on my phone.

I've been using Amazon for quite sometime, I used to buy the annual pass for prime, 1 and done! I've been building credit and having a small recurring charge is nice to have. so I've decided to lock my credit card which was my main payment on Amazon, but since it was locked they had the audacity to run my debit card? although it is not my primary card and more often then not has to be verified to use for a purchase. feeling a bit violated, to run a card without authorization or decline notice!

I used to use it several times a day, but now it has a crash bug. So that's great. Amazon at whole notwithstanding (I'm an ex-Prime Member because 2018 was the year of lost privileges and broken promises), this is an excellent app. When it opens, which it doesn't anymore.

Currently this app does not work - at all. I am having the same issue so many others are reporting now. The latest update broke the app and it just crashes over and over as it keeps trying to restart itself. The app was getting increasingly bloated anyway.. the search functions and the size/color menus on items can take over a minute to load

Tremendous waste of time. Can't reset my password because it returns a 404 error both in the app and the browser. Looks like a bunch of iframes hobbled together Don't pay for prime if you're paying for all the convenience of waiting until you're at a desktop to hopefully recover a simple password and then, maybe, order something

Super slow & never responds. Eats up battery like no tomorrow. Hate the that it requires you to click through pages instead of scrolling and won't show all search results. Tried using it solely on data and/or wifi and it still has issues. ALSO, WHY ARE THERE ADS?!?! SERIOUSLY?!? Amazon, if you can get away without paying taxes, please take off stupid ads from your app. I don't care if its ads for amazon products or not. :(

review for the APP not amazon itself. the app has been irritating me lately, click one item and opens up something totaly unrelated. ( my screen is perfectly fine no cracks, no other app i have does this. so its a bug). ill also add stuff to my cart and then it will disapear. or say unavailable. put its available when i use Amazon on my desktop.

This app is great for getting a lot of fun, cool stuff, however, I have never been impressed with how they ship their books. I have often ordered books new, only to receive them with stickers that can't be removed without damaging the book. My latest purchase arrived with the box sealant stuck to the side of the dust cover. It cannot be removed, so I have to go out of my way to return it, defeating the purpose of the easy order and delivery. I may as well have gone to the book store.

last updates ruined all past positive experiences: 1. became much slower 2. only 15-20 items per page 3. (and the worst) after changing color/size of an item "Done" doesn't work, the only option is to "go back" to the list. 4. selecting only one option at a time in filters. seriously??

This is a great place to do some shopping, as there are a lot of great deals at great prices! If you cannot find what you are looking for, try using other descriptive words in the searches. [**TIP**]: compare similar items AND check the product reviews before buying anything! If you have questions about the product(s), ask. Another plus is the Amazon Prime membership which gives members free shipping (only where it is marked).

Ever since this app updated it's basically unusable. Everytime you try to open anything to look at the details of a item a error message comes up. I've been trying to order these shoes for 2 days, but everytime I try and change the size a message comes up saying a error has occurred go to amazon home.

I've been trying to install this stupid app 4 more than a year. It never works. Does Amazon know how many thousands and thousands of dollars they've lost because when I click on an ad that I see for something in Facebook it wants to install this app instead of just taking me to their regular app where I would probably buy it immediately? Yeah that's the absurdity of this. Plenty of other people have had this problem and it's still not fixed even now.

This app is so annoying. It is great i guess for very basic item searches, but if you want to do anything extra, like share the item link with someone, you can't. The worst part of this app is that any time you are in a regular browser and happen to click an Amazon item link, the app automatically opens, and then you are stuck with the limited options. And sometimes you can't open the link without the app, regardless of workarounds. Uninstalled so i can use actual features of the Amazon website

I always loved this app. I shop on amazon all the time. I dont know if you had a recent update to the app but I am no longer able to view upcoming lightening deals on mobile devices. I've uninstalled and reinstalled the app a few times. Cleared the cache in the app and my phone and nothing works. I always used this feature to search for deals. Please fix this. It always worked prior but no longer works. Nothing shows when I click on upcoming deals.

False advertising, the website told me I'd get 10 bucks for downloading and signing into the app. According to the terms and services it ended two days ago and is not 10 bucks but it's instead a 10 dollars off coupon for a purchase of $20 or more. I was hoping to invest in a cheap electric eraser using the money but since i was lied to by Amazon i frankly don't want to give them any of my money from here or in the future... Unless they fix their habits that is.

During a 26 minute phone call with customer service, they insisted that my only option is to create a new email address for the account that I would like to keep, since my true email address is attached to the other account (which I have never used.) It is ridiculous to insist that I create a new email. Amazon should be able to merge the two accounts. They will not. I came up with my own solution. Changed email to an incorrect address, freeing correct email to be attached to correct account.

it's a fairly basic app for amazon, can let you check you order status fairly easily. I'd suggest turning off the personalized ads they send you in notifications. it doesn't spam them too often, but it doesn't have a problem with sending you multiple "check this out" notifications a day.

Frustrated beyond belief! My mobile app has suddenly started defaulting to or forcing my browser open. preventing me from toggling between them, slowing down my Amazon app and locking up after a few items. Frequently I'll be researching part numbers or compents in my browser and looking for and/or ordering in Amazon and this totally messes that up. If I wanted to use use my browser to access Amazon, I would enter the URL myself!

I am a new Amazon customer. Not thrilled!! When ordering, they offer free shipping on orders over 25 dollars. Fine. While I was ordering, they upped the free shipping order to 30 dollars. Grrr .... So I found something cheap to order to reach the 30 dollars free shipping. BAIT and SWITCH much, Amazon?.............I like the items that I received. Just the jerky free shipping offer bugged me. I will probably order from Amazon again ðŸ˜.

Like everyone else said, the new update is absolutely atrocious. The loss of continuous scrolling, no drag and drop wish list bar, and the filter system being the most broken thing I've ever seen, makes this the worse shopping app I've ever used. Sort price low to high has never worked because they would rather shill you there preferred brands instead of actually sorting the result. Also the lack of being able to set a min or max price is terrible too.

Please, FIX YOUR FILTER SEARCH it feels like it's getting worse since the last 3 updates. ! Now, when I select Amazon Prime purchase it goes back to the full 10,000+ search, lol. Also, when i try to filter from low to high or pick a rating I want to buy from. The menu refuses to change to anything but a blank screen. So Keep on screwing with your app. if you want less purchases from customers like me that rely on the search filter when there's tons of the same item ðŸ˜

Amazon as a company is still good but this is a horrible upgrade, the old one worked better. Not a fan, i like being secure but entering letters that are crossed out 10 times is not a step in the right direction I feel amazon really dropped the ball on this one. Also this is not an UPGRADE this is a new app. So now i have delete the old one enter all my info and verify.

I keep installing and uninstalling this app. It has some benefits over the website - it is easy to navigate - but it doesn't have a "find on this page" function. I often want to search for some feature and I have to scroll up and down the page to look for it. I uninstall it so Google results take me to the Amazon webpage where I can search the page for the feature or spec I'm interested in.

No problem with the shopping everything gets to me on time or earlier, my only problem is that it almost seems like im being double charged but it just has two seperate transactions that both are pending then one goes through while the other stays on pending for another week and that frustrates me cause i always have to keep an eye out to make sure i dont get charged double...

Been shopping for months now and on occasion I Amazon's POS system debited additional money on top of the stuff I ordered and claimed it eas because of my bank. The last straw was whennI was debited and the transaction was canceled. Despite me filing a dispute for it, them and Visa considered the transaction good so I ended up wasting money and not receiving the item I wanted to purchase. Never shopping on this site anymore.

I loved this app and would have given it a 4 if they hadn't taken away Amazon Smile capability. If I have to go to the website to do it, I may as well delete the app. I have the website link next to my store icon and because I want to use that service, I've stopped using this app. Please bring it back. Before that gaffe, the only issues I've had is that the app will force close (rarely but inconveniently) and the wish list drag and drop feature disappears from time to time.

The newest version of the Amazon App doesn't require to download from an unknown source, which is why I uninstalled the older version. The new Amazon App has an easy to use user interface. I much prefer the new version. Love shopping on Amazon and being able to track package progress.

I am very disappointed with Amazon, I have placed all my gift cards into their system, as I like shopping here. But it seems during this Halloween season certain items have been marked for special shipping (very expensive) in order for me to get my items on time. If I don't pay extra, I get all items after I don't need them... didn't know this site resorted to these type of tactics, but apparently now that Amazon is one of the biggest corporations, they forget what brought them to the top.

Really Dissapointed the drag to "save and compare" has been replaced with "hearts" and the save and compare bar is no longer at the bottom of the screen. No longer can you quickly swap between items for compassion via the convenient save and compare bar at the bottom the screen. You have to navigate via the menu, 3 clicks instead of 1.... Phones are Sooo tall now days, it's not like a tiny bar at the bottom of the screen is using up any real estate. Please return. Huawei P30 pro

Ads in an app for which I pay for premium service? Not cool! After making a purchase from my Prime account I tried to click the "continue shopping" button and right that moment a delayed ad appeared, causing me to load into another product I have absolutely no interest in. Am I not already spending enough money with Amazon? Do they really need to roll these shady ads? I am actually paying more for this stuff on Amazon usually anyway. The app sucks for many reasons, but that is the big one.

I love amazon but not this app, it's always lagging and crashing or loading blank pages then taking me back to the home screen while I'm browsing items and what sucks is when that happens, I can't seem to find my way back to the items I was last comparing. I'm better off just using the site itself there's really no difference between the two.

I find the Amazon shopping app great, with excellent deals on all items. I collect cards as a hobby,and the prices for them are unbeatable as opposed to other shopping sites with the exact same cards I want. It's a great alternative to eBay and many other shopping apps that gouge in taxes/fees. I love the app,and as a first time buyer,I recommend it highly to those who want products at a guaranteed fair price without the hassle.

Doesn't show preview of inside books. Support said the feature is there but I never got it on any of my mobile devices so far. When I click on book front page picture, at times it just hangs up with a rotating circle. Chat crashes at times. Otherwise, a great app

App won't even load home page all the way now without crashing, filter system is garbage (you can only apply 1 filter at a time before having to open and load the filter page again to add a second filter criteria. And most of the time it doesn't even apply so you spent all that time for nothing) also having to go to "next" page every 20 items is a hassle especially when half of them are sponsored links or if you want to compare items on 2 different pages.

New changes almost make the app useless. The app update cuts off descriptions of items rendering the description unusable and also limits the number of items you can see per page to 20. If a search turns up 500 you can only see 20 at a time now, good luck understanding what you are looking at as the description is 90% gone. I used to be happy to shop on Amazon... but now it's just frustrating. I bet Ebay will have what I al looking for.

Like everyone else I love Amazon. I purchase things from the app at least once a month (if not once a week or more) I especially love that on the App you can create Lists of things, at Christmas I told my son to Make a Christmas List using the Amazon app. Once I was ready to shop, everything he wanted was there making the process so easy. I've never been dissatisfied with any products I've purchased. I also LOVE the Subscription service offered on many health & beauty products. Its a Lifesaver!

I was placing an order and seen that a $25 or over gets free shipping, as it popped up. I was picking items and noticed some did and some did not qualify for or add to the $25...to get free shipping. Then I reseleted items to get free shipping. And I went to check out and was being charged for shipping...unless I clicked the "sign for free Amizon Prime" stuff. I almost cancelled when I figured out the secret way to select free shipping...guided advertising and my last order!

Even when deliveries are guaranteed, they are consistently delivered outside the delivery window and sometimes not delivered at all. At this point the only reason why I shop at Amazon is for their selection of items I wouldn't otherwise find at local stores around me. For this reason, it's harder to justify the price of shopping on Amazon.

Thlatest update where the filter settings wer changed is horrible. We used to be able to filter and see how the list of products changed as we filtered so we could keep choosing different filters until we got what we were looking for. Now the filter options are full screen and we have to go back and forth. Awful!

This is the first time I've ever wanted to revert an app to a previous version. Being able to scroll through my product search without having to constantly click to the next page is what made this app my preferred method of using amazon. With that gone I will most likely use the app less and look elsewhere for products that are easier to browse for.

Bring back list tray! It's very frustrating to have to click each item, click the heart, and then back track to do it all over again. Also I loved the long list of items instead of having to click the next button. Please fix this. I had to go back to the factory settings just to have the app enjoyable again.

It's the top website I go to when I'm shopping online, it's very reliable and I never have to worry about my information being stolen unlike other websites. Amazon has many great sales to buy and they're always on sale so it's never a hassle to find a good price for something you want because I guarantee you that Amazon has it and with a cheap price.

I've had Amazon prime for 5 months. pay for expedited shipping as part of my monthly payment. packages that are not shipped through USPS are late half the time. last package guy just dropped the package, it hit the ground so hard I heard it through my front door. Amazon music app is slow and the notification controls don't work most of the time. on the app when ordering price will state $15 but for a different color the price can shoot up 5-7 bucks.

The app doesnt show the picture when you click on it, then it will crash all the sudden. What good is it if you can't view the pictures. Plus, when you use the average rating filter you can't tell if it opens up because the app makes you scroll down. It's just not designed well. I like Amazon but hate the app.

I pull up the app on my Android Samsungung Galaxy S7, and I see a message stating the app is expired and to download the lastest, I tap the icon and am taken to Google for the download of the upgrade, though it only gives me the option to uninstall. Why do I get a message to upgrade when there is no option, addionally Amazon will not let me run the version I have. So what's the issue? What's the fix?

Miss older version. Filter options have been reduced to almost useless, only lets you do one filter at a time, and then filters begin to be ignored anyway. Do not like having to constantly click next page, go back to continual scroll. Searches have started to prove frustrating, showing me odd items. Now it's crashing every time I open the app.

The most recent versions are hopelessly broken. Filters are slow and take forever, if the work at all. The app hangs routinely and I end up FC-ing the app because it brings my entire device to a crawl. In short, it's a total pig, and any recent updates are just applying lipstick to the pig. I've gone to using a browser 100% to access Amazon now.

App doesn't actually load searches most of the time. I recently switched from an iPhone to a Pixel 3a. This app is not as stable as the apple app and many times I wind up having to reopen the app a few times to get it to actually work properly.

The current update is awful. No more drag and drop wish list additions and the link for add to wisk list barely works. I have to tap it repeatedly before it resopnds. This app was great, but not anymore. it takes much longer to apply filters to your search criteria. Can only do one at a time and have to go back to be able to apply more filters even in the same sub category. Pls create a drop down menu so all filters can be selected and applied in one go.

I really like the amazon app but right now it's being very annoying on my galaxy s7 edge. I already did update! after the first or second time this happened I clicked the update now option and updated but now it still always pops up..... I will change to 5 stars once that's taken care of.

Latest update seems to be waaay to synchronous with server session state. Trying to open search filters, I accidentally clear them more often than I manage to manipulate them the way I want.
