I'm on a Note 5 running Android 7.

this app is horrible. it repeatedly sends things to my moms house across town instead of my address, no matter how many times i correct it. the "one click buy" keeps ordering things to the wrong address, with expired cards, when i didnt even mean to press it. this app, aswell as every other amazon made app i have ever used, are absolutely terrible. they never work right.

the app keeps crashing. Everytime I select any item from the plethora of categories, on clicking next on any screen a dog appears and tells me something is wrong. i don't mind the dog, but what in the name of God went wrong?? i tried data on the phone, wifi, hotspot..its the same issue. tried iPhone amd same thing. Fix the damn thing

Amazon does not provide support for the underground Amazon app anymore which was AMAZING ( it was shut down a couple of days ago) , and now we ARE FORCED TO use this non reliable, no user friendly, boring app. Could you AT LEAST give us the tray option where items can be easily dragged into a list, making it more visible and easy to use ?

Only thing so far I see as issue is doing returns and having to provide picture. The app doesnt allow you to attach pictures to approve claims. So if you dont own a computer it makes difficult to do claims. Should update app with this ability not everyone uses computers anymore when are phones and tablets do almost all the same stuff

I love Amazon. Great customer service, especially when it comes to returns or refunds. This app can be rather slow and glitchy sometimes. That would be my only complaint. However I am not sure if it is my particular device or the actual app. Either way... My comment stands... Slow and glitchy sometimes. Overall good app, good company.

Amazon is awful. A horrible company with horrible people. Be careful because they'll lock your account for moving to a new state, but dont worry! They keep your Amazon Prime charges going with no way to unsubscribe from them. They say it's to "prevent fraudulent behavior" or something like that yet they charge. Trying to contact people who care is another horror story. I have been trying to unsubscribe from Amazon Prime for over two months and nothing. Just pain and an overdrawn bank account.

App is mostly functional if you know exactly what you want but as others have mentioned the recent filtering "update" is pretty buggy and frustrating. The whole point of using an app over the mobile browser is convenience and for me the convenience of the latter is significantly greater; I get less input lag and annoying ads (adblock), I can have multiple Amazon pages open, I use up less memory and storage, I have night mode, etc. I'd rather use my laptop, both mobile options still suck.

I've used Amazon for a very long time. It's odd how it suddenly doesn't want to work on my phone. Every time I open the app, it crashes. I've deleted and reinstalled the app, turned my phone off and then turned it on again. Still doesn't work. Apparently, others are having the same issue. Please fix this and I'll change my review as well.

Normally love my amazon. However recently every time I use the app and I select the item I was to view I get one of your adorable error screens with the dog on it. I love the dogs they are a nice touch. But I can't buy anything if I cannot even look at it to begin with. Please whatever this issue is fix it. I made sure I was updated I have fully closed every app and tried to go back in and I can't get anywhere.

When I want to search for something specific such as pastel striped jumper I end up having to scour through all sorts of irrelevant clothes. Hardly any of which are pastel striped jumpers. For this reason I mostly use ebay. Really quite frustrating and I imagine as a seller it must be quite bad that other items come up before theirs that have no relevance to what a buyer has typed into the search bar

Love Amazon as a brand, but the latest update is appalling. The layout is confusing, you can no longer scroll through the page, and the filter option doesn't let you filter more than one thing at a time. The worst thing is that the app now pushes all these random brands that seem to have untrustworthy reviews. Sort it out Amazon!

I started buying from amazon because I wanted books which aren't easily found where I live. And I could find whatever I wanted in amazaon even if is it is not that known. I bought two times. The first time, it went well and they didn't charge me except with what was told. The next time, the books took a long time to arrive, and when they did, they had put another large value saying it was because of other taxes (they never told me about it when I was paying). It was something I wanted to know.

I LOVE this app i love the ease, convenience, and most of all the prices!!! (Here comes the but....) However there was an update (October 2019) that keeps causing the app to freeze and crash which has never happened before!!?? This is the second week since the update and I sure am hoping they do something to fix it quickly! I spent thousands of dollars with the company the least they could do is make sure their app is working correctly! When it is fixed my rating will be right back at 5 stars!!

three stars may be a bit harsh but I'm doing this relative to just going on the browser which is an awesome user experience. but the app fall short along with a few other gripes, e.g.default address and cards my main ones are; Wish lists, why can't we search wish lists? Cats and dogs are not the same stop notifying me that you think i might be interested in cat food, I'm really not, I even set-up Amazon pet (in browser as it doesnt seem to exist in app) thinking that would clue you in but nope.

I really really dislike the new search. If i wanted to click dozens of times to go through them i would do so in my pc. Plus where is the option to press and hold to swipe something to your saved list straight from the search results? Also the filters are so limited. Why can't i choose all my filters at once? Absurd. Fix asap please

The new way to filter items is not user friendly! It gets annoying that after every selection, it takes me away from selecting anther option. This makes me having to go through the same process repeatedly just to choose another option. It also doesn't recognize my taps on the first try. When it does finally recognize my taps, it tends to clear out my search criteria that I painstakingly went through to select originally (since I'm tapping repeatedly in the same area).

They have ads on the app. An app that that is dedicated to shopping and who I spend both a yearly fee for prime on, and thousands per year on, has ads. Because they don't already get enough money from me they think they need to post ads for things like cars and Oreo sweepstakes on. Not like they are ads for Amazon products which is totally fine, but ads for third party things. If anything it makes me hate the brands the advertise on the app.

I keep getting a white screen when I find a good item and it gets stuck. also Amazon promoting their Prime products is blocking the market for everyone else I'm trying to find something to specific and Amazon keeps throwing other things in there that I'm not looking for I type in the word long sleeve I shouldn't see cups and dishes just because I say from lowest to high prices

Beyond Frustrated!!! tried to order the Roborock S5 Smart Vacuum while it was discounted for a limited time. However I recieved error messages and the order did not go through. After that ended there was a coupon offered for $171 off. I clicked the box for the coupon and was told it would be applied at checkout. It was NOT applied so I cancelled the order. I used customer service chat option and then a phone call but but after an hour+ I was told nothing they could do and to just leave feedback.

No Sign Out option with this version of the app. In order to sign out & switch accounts, you have to clear your app's data cache in your phone. Not intuitive or convenient to say the least. The rest of the app is as good or better than the previous version.

used to love this app but after a recent purchase, it's been a shambles of a service. During that purchase-at checkout, I was informed that delivery would be 1-2 days. After patiently waiting for 2 weeks, I contacted the seller 3 times only to be told each time to wait. I then contacted amazon support who kept ending the online chat conversation and were not interested in helping me at all. Amazon have changed for the worse unfortunately, won't be using them again.

I can't even use the map anymore an error page pops up every few seconds, it's an extreme sport trying to add items to my cart, view items and cash out. I've been patient for weeks but I'm getting annoyed now sometimes it takes dozens of try just to beat the annoying error page to view an item.

installed, then early one morning randomly got a notification that my Amazon prime subscription had been activated. I don't subscribe to Amazon prime. So I called customer service oh, and they said it had been activated through the Amazon shopping app weeks past when it was initially installed. Have disabled the app and I'm trying to uninstall it from my phone but it won't let me.

I can't get the app to not crash since downloading newest update! This is extremely frustrating as I am expecting 3 packages today and can't get in to view my tracking numbers. I've tried everything, but looks like whatever developers did is super incompatible with my Google Pixel 3 (which is running on the latest available update too). Please fix this, I have another package coming tomorrow and definitely need to make sure of when its out for delivery.

I used to be a big fan of Amazon but not anymore. Had been on a wait list for a product during prime day and received a notice that a spot was available. I immediately went on the app and desktop to claim my spot but nothing was there. I checked everywhere to try getting the deal, even customer service. They told me I had to be on the wait list and that the wait list was full, therefore they couldn't do anything. I tried explaining that I had been but they said the same thing and would not help.

This app is littered with bugs. Never had an issue before just using the website. I'm trying to do a return and everytime I try to print the label it sends me back to the homescreen. Tried to get customer service to help and all they wanted me to do was use a computer instead of the app so obviously they know it doesn't work properly. This has been incredibly frustrating so don't even bother putting this app on your phone just use Amazon through a web browser.

list issue since last update. Recently updated the app and noticed that the default list doesn't sort items based on date added anymore. Previously, it would sort items based on newest to oldest, but now recently added items are 15 deep into the list. I checked sort options and it's set to default and only other options are price or priority..nothing for date.

Most annoying thing when I'm trying to click a picture to view the product closer and the picture won't open. Sometimes clicking it doesn't respond to anything and sometimes the pictures just loads and loads and never actually opens. This has been a problem for awhile, why has this not been fixed.

I have used Amazon for years. All items have been delivered on time excellent conditional. Worth the value. If I click by mistake customer support always deal with things totally effectively. Brilliant bargains. I love the Kindle books, DVD's and many other goods. when I type what I need in the easy to use search bar straight away lots of bargains from high to low Amazon are brilliant.

The mammoth collection of products and services that can be ordered from Amazon are organized conveniently in this feature rich app. Options such as personal lists, surveys, try and buy, or gift finder complete a solid experience. Custom sorting of shopping list items which is existing in desktop version is missing though.

The app is fine, the rating reflects my utter disappointment at how shipments across Europe are being handled by Amazon. They use poor delivery chains and generate unrealistic lead times. Couple of orders lost after weeks of confusion. Very frustrating. They will refund your payment, however this is not the point after waiting for weeks and then discover that the prices have increased....

I had my app for a few years now and always five stars but this is the second time I had to uninstall and reinstall due to some error that disallow me from launching it. I have a note 8 for a year now and this happened twice within 2 months. hopefully this reinstall will be the last.

App keeps freezing at different times (changing product options, filters, sellers, adding to lists) and sometimes needs to be restarted. This didn't happen a year ago. Can we go back to that? I'll take the reduced functionality in exchange for an app that actually works.

The app is mostly fine, but it drives me nuts that it doesn't have "Look Inside" as an option for books. I often read the first page or so of a book to see if the author's writing style is something that clicks with me. I can't do this on either the app or the mobile version of the site, so I'm still using the desktop site on my phone for this. I don't understand why there's no Look Inside feature for the app.

not sure what happened burt now this app is very slow to load, sometimes i will press one item and itll take me to the page of an item that i already scrolled passed, so its very off sync, also sometimes im not able to scroll through the items additional pictures it just stays stuck on the default. ive never had a problem before till now nothings changed on my end and my internet speed is the highest available and other apps work fast and flawlessly so

Amazon Prime is a SCAM!! The prices are the same practically just on prime the shipping is included in the overall price of the product. This is terrible plus they sold me a laptop with hidden spyware from a third party then refuse to refund all because the registered the third party without actually verification of their legitimacy. WOW such a terrible buisness. Beware to all those shopping online, Wish is a cheaper better alternative until Amazon can fix their service and be more legitimate!!!

The app itself if usually fine. I've had a couple issues with it freezing. I've had most issues with products that use UPS for shipping. Avoid them. UPS won't deliver your package on time and say they missed you even if you spent the entire day home waiting. Nightmare! I won't be buying products with that carrier again.

I had 2 orders placed prematurely on this piece of crAPP. I cancelled the first 1 & tried again. However, while I was in the process of entering my 2nd gift card number, somehow the order was placed again before I could finish. There definitely should be a confirmation button or some type of 2-step feature that prevents this from happening. I was so angry & wanted to throw my phone against the wall. I think I'm just going to use my laptop from now on so I don't have to go through this again!

Company Over Customer I find myself reaching for another device or simply searching a different retailer. The search feature limits your results if you choose anything but the featuted sort option. And the choice of brands for filtering is equally limiting. Simply put, a frustrating shopping experience that seems to favor quantity over quality.

Only giving it a 3 because of all the "upgrades" has made the app annoying! Who wants to spend 10 minutes trying to find what you want to search. What happened to basic home goods, outdoors, sporting. Gotta break it all the way down to bobbers. What about browsing through the departments.

I only put 1 star so I can add this review because with the new update I would not even give it 1 star. I am a prime member and I used Amazon almost daily. Since latest update that has changed. I can't scroll anymore to see all available options. Most of the time you get an oops page and have to start over. Filtering options used to be easy now it's frustrating, and the latest thing I can't even be the app immediately crashes making me go to desktop, something I am not able to do often.

Awful update, app was easily 5 stars before. Since the August 2019 update whenever you search it only provides a few items before having to press Next and wait for more to load. Also the facility to long press on an item & drag to your wish list at the bottom of the screen has vanished. I often add items to compare later to my wishlist so this function is sadly missed. Please developers take note & restore the app to before the 'update'. This app has lost it's appeal now making browsing stilted.

Long time Amazon Prime customer & heavy e-commerce lifestyle... If app doesn't change back to continuous scrolling, I will be changing to another platform.... Where I live I can get simalar service from several platforms... App design, easy UI, and speed/comfort to browse/buy are why I loved Amazon... New app update was a huge step backwards. Why parse a consumers browsing?? Not happy....

There has been a bug for awhile that when you select options for a product, the "done" button doesn't work and you can't select any options. You have to go back in order to get the menu to shut. Also if I'm using my vpn while I'm on public wifi the whole app doesn't work.

No idea what is going on but here lately every time I open the app it instantly closes on me did get it open long enough to get a couple things in my cart then it crashes and I can't get it to open again so I can pay for my items to receive them in time .... Getting very frustrated with this and hope it gets fixed soon if not I'll take my money elsewhere and cancel my membership

You're better off shopping on Amazon through either the chrome browser or just on a computer. Adding items to a list is flawed and will add items to the wrong list. Bring back the old filtering method! The new way of selecting and applying filters is horrible. But the need to keep going back to the page is very annoying.

I absolutely love using Amazon shopping! Fast, convenient, and has good selections. And offers some free shipping on select items. Having coupons would be more beneficial. Or order so much, save some kind of a deal. Especially when one might order a lot. I have Amazon Prime, but it offers no discounts for my membership. Only disappointment.

Why isn't it easy to see what the cost of an item is or an order total when I check my orders? Amazon claims to have deals but they just raise the prices on product and cut the prices back. The worest app and online experience i have ever had. I will not buy from them again. Far too many time I've had orders marked as delivered and not actually having it. Sometimes a part of the order is missing. pathetic. I ordered something and after few days got an SMS that my order is cancelled without mentioning any reason. Edit - Still no fix. Sorted by "Featured" 40,000 results, Sorted by "Low to High" 74 results. Ridiculous! So tired of the app! The screen goes black, shuts down, reverts me back to the main screen for no reason and the search settings are horrendous! I search for an item, see over 1000 items, then select sort from low to high and all of a sudden there are only 200 items or less to view! This app needs work and I cant even find where to submit bug reports without chatting with customer support.

Since the last update the filtering system is a real problem. I have problems opening the filtering and when I am able to I am only able to select one filter at a time and it keeps taking me back to the search results. It has made the filtering of searches so long winded and difficult to use.

the wishlists are all jumbled up. when you set one to the bottom for quick adding, sometimes it puts the items in a completely different list and then have to go back and move things out and to the right one. the online site is great, amazon is great, but the app is having some severe issues

Hi,  I just order an item on Amazon App and have completed the order. I logged out but then I couldn't sign in again. After many attempts, I successfully signed in but my order history has gone. Much worse than the previous version. Reduced the filter options drastically, and every time you make 1 filter change it kicks you out. Even if you want to select more than 1 seller for example, you have to go back in each time. Terrible.

Prepare to get constantly upset when trying to shop using this application. Every time I start searching items I'm booted back with a error occurred message. There fore forcing me to start ALL OVER AGAIN in my search of a specific item. This application just doesn't fit the bill in today's technology. No reason why it still doesn't work without giving me an error every time I'm searching for items and trying to shop. Unacceptable! Fix what's broken! Already!

You can report a problem with a review, but you can't report a problem with a product listing, and there are SO MANY PROBLEMS WITH LISTINGS (e.g. totally different products being listed as different "colors", "sizes", or "formats" under one listing). It is literally impossible to report these errors because customer support doesn't understand. Just add a freaking "report" button on products and not just reviews!!!!

Latest update very annoying! No option to filter deals any more. The app is great, for some reason on my new phone it won't connect to the app well. same with eBay. Well it launches the app just fine. I can't search for anything. Nothing will load. I am usually on Amazon weekly, if not daily. my only issue is the freezing in the app itself, when I try to remove or put an item in save for later it will show loading, then kicks me back with an error message. it does this continuously to the point of frustration. that is my only issue.

my first bad experience with Amazon. I order a part for my work truck was a two day shipping and my order was shipped late and is coming a day later. LOVE IT!!! App does not work anymore. the app used to work but now everytime I try to use the app it says "UH-OH Something went wrong on our end" it's been happening for the past few weeks and I cant do anything about it. amazon sent me a link while browsing online with a $10 credit offer to download and log into their app. I did so and and assembled a 25 dollar order. Recently found that app is consuming significant amount of data in background. In a week time, 4GB data was consumed in background and this app is continuing consuming data in background. The app works okay. but it kept harassing me to sign up for Amazon prime. Over and over. So I uninstalled it. A few weeks after I uninstalled it the first time I needed it again and reinstalled it. No thanks Amazon, I will not have an app on my phone that allows you to spam me with advertisements in the middle of the night.

i havent used this app in over 2 weeks but for some reason every few minutes i get an error that says it quit working and to send a report which i have done dozens of times i have even stopped the app manually but it keeps crashing while its not even running. Ive dealt with this annoyance for to long im deleting all amazon apps and canceling my prime membership.

i think I'm addicted to Amazon... there are pretty good deals on Amazon but i noticed recently that they allow anyone to sell items through them. 3 out of 5 of my recent orders got messed up. and Amazon usually doesn't make up for it right away, if at all so you'll have to deal with the seller. Also, the shipping carrier Amazon has, sucks, they rarely deliver on time, two day shipping turns into an -up to- six day, shipping. but that's on the company, not the app, the app is fine so far

The ability to limit searches to products with prime shipping only has been removed? Why? I dont have time to scroll through dozen or even hundreds of cheap items with exorbitant shipping that are going to take three weeks to arive from asia with no return policy. This is not the reason I use Amazon. Bring back the old app.

This app has become more difficult for users. Biggest change is the lists. You used to be able to simply drag items to the list tab on the bottom of screen. Their idea of "customer service" is a joke. The app keeps rejecting my credit card without a valid explanation, and when asking customer service I'm always told to "send an email" which takes me back to the same automated system and starts the whole process all over again. And to think that I even registered with prime, just to have my time wasted. Shame. I do not recommend shopping with them. Find somewhere else to get your items, because if there's an error it's not getting fixed anytime soon.

Worst customer service imaginable! I have purchased alot of items over the past few years and had Prime and don't believe I have had to speak to someone before. I bought 4 solar lights and only two worked which I found out after I had installed them. I contacted customer service and spoke to Anush. He was a sarcastic person and said only thing I can do is return them for a refund (knowing full well I have already installed two!) Never again using Amazon.

Honestly the apps pretty great. I highly recommend turning on the "prime" filter since there seems to be alot of products way over priced from third party sellers. I also used to think "Amazon has everything!" until this recent holiday season. Definitely hit up Walmart or other stores when shopping since Amazon does have a lack of specific products, but I absolutely love that I can just open the app in store to see what is the cheaper option.

Lately every time I try to use this or the music app it won't load. I stream Netflix, videos on Facebook, and YouTube without problem but Amazon won't load. Why is that? I am ready to delete all of Amazon's apps because they never work anymore. Is anybody else having this problem besides my wife and I? We can't be the only ones.

Before this version I got to see those dogs and "something went wrong on our part" every once in a while... Now is every search I do. Please fix! One week after the previous review, 5 or 6 failed attempts to get some kind of help from the Amazon people and now... my wish came true: I don't see the dogs on the screen anymore... now the app closes a few secinds after opening it.

App doesnt show camera icon to take picture of tape bar code to get the $5 discount. crashes a lot of the time and freezes. Amazon activated a Prime Account for me without my consent three times. I called each time to cancel and get a refund. On this last transaction, Amazon didn't show that the Prime Account was active. (first off let me start by saying that I'm worst at returning the items, given the fact that my most recent purchase did not complete my outfit for the look I was trying to achieve. as much as I do love this app there sort/filtering items needs to be fixed. it may not happen for everyone but when I try another sorting method besides "featured" it limits the search from thousands of items to choose from to, most of the time, around 9. please fix this Amazon! and like I said I do love the service

Good app very easy to use would definitely reccomend to download for easy access to Amazon only downside is for me I'm experiencing problems with add to cart and buy now sometimes it feels like I have to press the button hundreds on times for it to work like the app has a problem loading that page? Apart from that yes I give this app a 7/10 very easy to use just like the website and easy to access from the home screen.

The app is too touchy, while I'm trying to scroll it will open an item as if I clicked the link for it. Also when filtering my search it's overly tedious that it makes you you go back in to the filter settings each time you want to add another filter (you click clothing it realoads the page then you have to go to filters again to click womens, and again to choose the color of the item).

Used this app on regular basis an it worked great. Unfortunately it stopped working around the begining of June 2019. Unistalled and reinstalled still doesn't work. Coincidentally around the same time I developed a problem with Amazon website on in google Chrome on my laptop. Works with Firefox. I don't know if these are Amazon or Google issues.

Recent change included advertisement movies without app setting to opt out. That's too intrusive for a shopping app, at least for my taste. Scrolled page and tapped the movie by accident, then it started playing sound, which is even worse. Bad choice from Amazon to make this change, very annoyed.

I am a prime member and couldn't be happier. I have dealt with amazon customer service a couple of time and they are easy and great to deal with. They also have a messenger option for their customer service which make handling questions much eaiser. The prime video and music are great additions to the service and when coupled with an Echo makes for an enjoyable experience. All and all I am very satisfied customer.

I have always used the Amazon underground app until it was mentioned to install this app and boy was that a bad decision. The app crashes like it's 2008 and then shows a lovely whiten or black screen. In the end I just used the website and now saving money because I'm not spending as much through the app!! LOVE the app! Monstrous help for getting those rarer CDs to getting guitar accessories in bulk,or those little bits & pieces needed to modding guitars,pedals,amps,etc. Huge help for guitarists and gear geeks like myself but cant find something in a shop in nowhere USA (Maine) suddenly like another person stated the app fails and closes,i hope this is fixed soon,i got sets of pickups and other gear on the way. NO MORE CONTINUOUS SCROLLING?? I use the Amazon app on the daily & with the new update I have to use a "next" button to go thru pages? And the filtering is clunky now. I used to be able to select all the filters I want & then apply them, now I have to select them one by one, bringing me back to the results after every filter. So. Annoying.

Amazon app is TOTALLY unusable on my phone. I cannot even get it to open fully. It crashes before the front page finishes loading. No such thing as customer service. I put a few items in my cart weeks ago because I was simply keeping track of them. I'm so interested in the shopping app Amazon, it has been such a great opportunity to be able to buy a couple of very affordable, cheap things, only buy a few taps on a moble device such as, a computer, tablet, smart phone, andriod. I love this app and all that comes with prime, but lately I can not search through tye reviews or ask a question on specific products like I have in the years before. which sucks when you only want to buy a specific dvd if it has several languages on it and amazons language section is often incorrect. always seems to say it just has english when it will also have spanish and/or french. which would be the only reason I would buy most dvds.

Terrible. Slow, many key features don't load (e.g. accessing the messages tab for whole foods delivery), and it hijacks all Amazon links in chrome and then hangs, never loading the page. On the plus side, it's a great way to ensure I can't buy anything from Amazon.

Suddenly Completely Unstable. Not sure what happened, but once it opens up, it blinks, restarts, then kicks up an app closure notice, then shuts down. This is on the current update. Once I removed the update, everything is working fine.

Two big peeves with apps exist in this app for me. 1) No obvious way to exit/logout from within the app other than hitting back key repeatedly going back through all pages visited until one gets back to the "top" then clicking again to exit. 2) Even after exiting app as above the app stays in memory doing who knows what until one kills the process manually via Usage Manager or other means. Silly stuff. No excuse for it from a big industry player like Amazon

The whole thing with the Add-on Items is stupid. No one should be forced to spend $25 if they don't want to. That part should be OPTIONAL! I just want to buy two toys for my daughter and I can't because I don't want to spend $25 dollars and I can't check out with just two Add-On items that costs add up to less than $25. Amazon fix this please.

Taking away the wish list tray for quick item adding to a chosen list is one of the worst mistakes I've ever seen. Then on top of it making searching for things a chore of it's own through the terrible filter is next level retarded. Please fix these, bring back the tray, fix the filter and handle the issues your customers are speaking about. Only then will I change my rating to something better, I used to love this app and now I am beginning to despise it.

no stars. i installed and updated it immediatly since I had just signed up for account and opted in on 30day free trial for Prime. was finishing the options and settings and of course security when a notice popped up and informed me that my less than 1 hr old Amazon/Amazon Prime account I spent so much time verifying codes for security, and had already been informed I was granted my new prime membership, had now been locked and my prime membership was cancelled.

The new way to drilldown by categories after a search is THE WORST. You can't select multiple criteria at one time. You select them one at a time and then it reloads the search results for each selection. What used to take seconds now takes ten minutes. No exaggeration! Do a search. Reload. Department. Reload. Men. Reload. Clothing. Reload. Shirts. Reload. Reload. Reload. Reload. Plus, the content jumps around enough that it's too easy to click on the wrong things. Aaaaargh.

App keeps crashing a few seconds after I open it. The searched items are sponsored and not really what I'm looking for. Really don't like the new UI. Needs to have an edit button to clear recent searches. The list gets so long and it's a pain to go through and have to clear them 1 by 1.

amazon is an amazing shopping app and very easy to use. Delivery usually is very fast plus products have reviews so you can choose what size you need easier or whether or not product is worth getting. i have lots of liquid blue shirts from this company and skate shoes you can find for a better price than stores. they really sell anything and everythin i ordered soo far is as described and shippin usually is faster than expected.

it's great in every way, except that it gets stuck loading, or doesn't load at all sometimes, especially while signing in. You also can only be signed in to one account per device on every amazon app, which is a problem since I shop on one account and stream music through the Amazon music app on another.

The wish list tray feature has been taken out in the latest update, but there is no mention of it anywhere. I am increasingly frustrated with Amazon. I am a long-time subscriber to their Subscribe and Save program. Wish I could put zero or lower stars ðŸ˜ nothing works in this app, when I go to today's deal and tap on see all in "saving & sales it shows a white blank page and nothing more, I received notifications about items I watch and when I click on them it shows white blank page, it's very hard to find everything, I'm sorry but I just can't accept a huge company like amazon have an out of date and crappy app like this, I don't know why but everytime I open this app it really reminds me of Windows 98 ðŸ˜

I'm basically done with this. This app literally never cancels even with my order within that hour. I have better experiences with EBAY. I literally got a notification maybe 5 minutes after requesting a cancellation and it hasn't even shipped or been a day. Same thing every time.

My stars is because of the changes from updates. Now it is harder and longer to browse and filter and l wouldn't doubt uses more data. The changes made it very similar to desktop web page. Terrible, not like it used to be. Deliver with any other service is fine. Amazon drivers put can't get into building. It's a hotel.. I just had two other packages from ups delivered that morning. I enjoy going the DVDs to preview the trailers. For the past 2 days and when I go to certain DVDs and attempt to review the trailer, it won't play and closes me out. I have gone through about a dozen technicians to correct the problem, all to know avail. Very frustrating.

New update??? I don't know what's going on, but it keeps crashing every time I try to view my orders or navigate beyond the home screen. Usually perfect. I usually love this app. I use it often but now that it's Christmas time and I'm needing to order important things on a time limit, the app decided to be faulty. If the only point of this app is to purchase things, this app utterly fails. It will not "proceed to checkout" it just reloads the cart forever. Good job on making an utterly useless app. Amazon you're frigging amazing at that. A streaming service that barely works, and a shopping app that doesn't let you buy things.

App worked great until the last update. Now it takes forever to narrow down searches because you always get sent back to the search screen instead of filter home. Then after going through 2 or 3 pages I loose all my filters. Sooo frustrating and disappointing. I hope Amazon fixes this major problem soon.

I like the alerts for offers in the wishlist, and updates from an order. But this app, is SOOO slow! Its like going back to 90s dial up internet, just without the dial tone. Compounded by the fact that browsing amazon on the internet, which actually works, constantly gets redirected to open the app.

I love Amazon and this app works great. Never any issues. However, i am awaiting the update that allows you to buy things separately from within your basket. Always runs SLOW, and is continuously freezing up. I've cleaned the app cache, restarted the app, and restarted my phone, to no avail. app used to be good, now if you cancel items it still shows up in the app and theres no way to remove them even tho they are gone on the actual amazon website. items seem to be stuck within the order page after already being ordered and they dont disappear and amazon doesn't know why. app has already been uninstalled and reinstalled. does no solve issue.

Simply horrible. It used to work at least decently. But over the last few months it keeps resetting every time I carry out a search. All this even though I didn't change anything in the setting of my cell. Maybe Amazon is too big to fail, but it certainly seems too big to care about its users' experience.

This new version sucks. It keeps crashing, doesn't work most the time, it keeps changing my search words. I try to type in spiles for maple tree tapping and it changes my results to spikes every time. It's damn near impossible to find the item I was looking at just a few days ago.

The search feature is inefficient. It displays unrelated items constantly, repeats sponsored items multiple times in the same list, ignores key words, shows non-Prime items in Prime-only lists, and is just plain difficult to use. The app in general is user unfriendly and makes shopping a chore.

Amazon app is a horrible experience at times. It freezes and takes forever to load any product and all its sizes and colors. Every action there is lag and freezing. Very frustrating. Watch out for the Prime nag screen! I have been an Amazon prime member for over a year. I recently made a big order of Christmas stuff. They charged me $130 extra, leaving me a full time single mother with $10. When i called the girl told me i was wrong & cancelled my order for me. I had to wait a week for refund. All together 11 transactions. In the end I'm still out $30. I also missed out on a few of the deals i wanted. After I reorder i will be done as a prime member & will always order through PayPal & smaller orders.

App worked beautifully until 2 weeks ago. Now, when I try to check out it gives me password incorrect errors where the browser works just fine with the same login. Rather than constantly switch login info, I have just started using outside retailers when I need something and will continue to do so until this issue is resolved. *Note: Uninstall/reinstall and PW reset did not work .

dont waste your time with prime! only 33% of your orders get to you in time even tho when checking out it very clearly states "Guaranteed delivery by..." its 100% false advertisement over the past several months I either havent recieved what I've ordered or it's taken 2-4 times longer then specified. hate the new filter/sorting window, the old menu was better. also when are you guys ever going to fix the issue with low to high sorting?!? thousands of items listed as featured, sort by low to high and the number always drops dramatically, plus items seen in the featured listing cant be found at their price point when sorted low to high.

Very poor experience. I would suggest a more minimalistic style on the app. The app constantly crashes despite the recent update and takes longer to load than eBay, unfortunate as I rely on Amazon but might have to switch overall. Very disappointing for a multi-billion dollar company.

I am really surprised how Amazon has done poor itegration with many filtering issues !!! they should test first and insure if their website ready to go before doing so , among thousands of products, filtering option is the most important part for online shopping websites, if u dont have it, no one will find what he need ! was shocked when I saw the same product available 5 times bcz each one has different size !!!! there is no option to filter by size in android version hope to fix it soon

PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE FIX THIS APP TO STOP IT FROM ADDING EVERY ITEM YOU HAPPEN TO TOUCH ON THE SCREEN TO ONE OF YOUR LISTS WHILE TRYING TO SCROLL!!! I can shop Amazon, but not without serious programming issues. Won't hold selected list, just comes up empty. Choose a list, minutes later, back to no list. When no list selected, app is "confused" as to where to store items. Obviously very little testing before releasing for general public use.

only choice to shop on Amazon is this app, and this app mostly shows items that are currently unavailable, I buy stuff randomly that is advertised and not cause I need it, what I need is available only in grocery stores and I walk down to the store and buy it, shopping is one of my ways to kill time and de stress and when I am browsing something just comes up and when I click and read on it to find it more interesting and when I want to check price it says currently out of stock. time waste.

It keeps saying "oops something went wrong on our end". It's tedious, whenever I want to buy something I have to update this app and restart my phone and, even after all that. it still won't work sometimes. I recommend just using a PC if you can.

starting to become frustrated with my prime. what's the point of having 2 day shipping if my purchases started getting delayed, or not left at my location on time. Lately the app won't auto focus when scanning a barcode. My work around is to minimize it, open my phones integrated camera app. Wait for it to auto focus, switch to the Amazon app so it can take advantage of how the lens is focused. This is the only way can get it to scan a barcode.

Good app, just has a bug every so often. For those having issues with it right now, go to your settings, then to App manager, then the amazon app. Clear the Data and Cache on the Amazon App, then click Force Close on it. After that, restart the Amazon App, sign back in, and it shouldn't crash anymore.

Pretty Bad since update and removal of the Amazon Underground App. The Alexa feature constantly not working saying no connection to server. Search engine is biased to "featured items". used to love the app, but it appears they have removed the list tray from the bottom of the app. Can no longer drag an item to a list, or scroll a list while looking at an item. It was such a simple and useful feature, yet they just took it away and never said anything. Very disappointed.

So many bugs. You report them they do nothing. They tell you to reinstall. That's their and for everything. I'm in a reading group with over 1000 users. Nothing wrong with the app - works great. However, I have problem with the security. It does not reauthenticate you when you try to change your account info - shipping address for example. Anyone who steals your phone can add his own shipping address and order stuff from your acct.

"Amazon shopping keeps stopping" not a very good shopping tool if I can't actually open the app and buy anything. and yes I've tried force stopping, clear cache, clear data then a complete uninstall and reinstall. The error still comes up. I have no other issues with any other app. Galaxy s10+
